evaṃ viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo 'sādhāraṇasyacasaṃśayahetutve nirākṛte sūtravirodha mudbhāvayannāha * nanu(ca?)śāstretatra tatrobhayathā darśanaṃ saṃśayakāraṇamapadiśyate * iti tatra tatra śāstre tasmistasmin sūtre “dṛṣṭañca dṛṣṭavat” dṛṣṭaca manasi mānābhisambaddha ubhayacā, parāyā bhavati । dṛṣṭañca manasi kriyāvatvaṃ punardaṣṭena tulyaṃ vartata iti sad asparśavattvam । ato viruddhasādhanābhisambaddhaṃ mano dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kiṃ mūtam uta amūrta mana iti । 'yathā dṛṣṭam ayathādṛṣṭañca <= va. sū0> ' saṃśaya ityasādhāraṇasya ca saṃśayahetutvamuktam । yathā dṛṣṭaṃ pakṣe, dṛṣṭa sapakṣe, vipakṣe ca na dṛṣṭam, ata ubhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt

II,199,7 (VyV_II,199,7^1) (VyV_II,199,7^2)

yad vā yathādṛṣṭaṃ kriyāvattvena punarayathādṛṣṭam aspara ' ubhābhyāṃ saha dṛṣṭatvāt saṃśaya ityuktaṃ paraṇāha । viṣayadvaitadarśanādutpatteḥ । asyaiva vivaraṇam * saṃśayotpattau viṣa nameva kāraṇam * iti । viṣayadvaite dṛśyata iti viṣayadvaitadarśanaṃ sāmā yasya vā dvaitaṃ vaividhyaṃ yasya, tat tathoktaṃ sāmānyaṃ tadarśanameva, paśaṣānuvṛttihetutvāta saṃśayakāraṇaṃ na viruddhahetusannipātaḥ, asādhāraṇa "' viruddhaviśeṣaiḥ sahānapalambhena tasya tatsmārakatvānupapatteḥ । manusmṛtihetuśca dharmaḥ saṃśayakāraṇaṃ na parasparavirodhī samānabala mānabalatve ca * tayoḥ paraspara virodhāta itarasyetareṇa pratibandhāta utpādakatvaṃ syānna(tu?) saṃśayahetutvam * tailādinābhyaktasya śāli - svāṅakurānatpādakatvavaditi abhyupagamyaitadaktam । paramārthato jyāstulyabalatvamasti * anyatarasya amūrta mana iti * anumeyodde "parādhitvāt * iti । tathā cāgamaḥ tadabhāvādaṇu manaḥ' saṃśayasya viṣayadvaitadarśanādura yadvaitadarśanameva kāraṇam nyameva । viṣayasya vā dvara viruddhaviśeṣānuvṛttihata dharmo vā, viruddhāva viruddhaviśeṣānusmṛtiharu iti । samānabalatva * nirṇayānutpādakatvaṃ syānna bījasya svāṅakura * na ca tayostulyabala śasyāgamavirodhitvāt * iti । mūrtatvañca avyāpita vacanamapramāṇam ? tarhi manaḥ sadbhāvāsiddharāśrayāsiddhamanumāna māṇam ? tarhi ma bhūtatvānabhyupagame māvana yugapaj

II,199,21 (VyV_II,199,21)

athedaṃ vacanamapramāṇam ? tarhi manaḥ । miti yathoktalakṣaṇānupapattiḥ । na ca tyāpi manaḥsadbhāvasiddhiḥ, jñānotpattiprasaṅgāta । ataḥ pratijñā na yathoktalakṣaṇamiti । viruddhād bhidyate iti vi panyāsāt । sadbhāvasiddhiḥ. amartasya sakalendriyādhiṣṭhāyakatvena yagapaja. māt । ataḥ pratijñāvacanasyāgamena virodhād amūrtānumānaṃ kṣaṇāmati । ayantu viruddhabhedaḥ pratijñāvasare 'bhihita eva । bhidyate iti viruddhabhedaḥ kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ, duṣṭapakṣopanyāsānantaramu

II,200,1 (VyV_II,200,1)

sūtradvitayañca ekadharmiviṣayatvena saṃśayapratipādanārthamiti vyākhyeyam । tathā ca, niyatasāmānyavastu pratiniyataviśeṣaiḥ sahacaritamekadā dṛṣṭaṃ punasta ttulyam anyaviśeṣāvinābhūtam, ataḥ kālāntare deśavyavadhānavaśāt tad dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimidamevam āhosvidevaṃ na bhavatīti । tathā ekadharmi viṣayatve 'pi । “yathādṛṣṭam” iti kiñcit sāmānyavadvastu kenacid viśeṣeṇa saha dṛṣṭam, “ayathādṛṣṭam” tadevopalabdhiviśeṣaśūnyaṃ viśeṣāntarasahitaṃ dṛṣṭam, ata ubhayathā dṛṣṭatvādubhābhyāṃ saha dṛṣṭatvād ubhayaśūnyasyopalabdhau tatsmaraṇa tu asati, saṃśayo bhavatīti । yathā devadattaṃ sakeśamupalabhya punarniṣkeśam, ataḥ kālāntare tameva veṣṭitaśirasamupalabhamānasya kimayaṃ sakeśo niṣkeśo veti saṃśayo bhavatīti ।

II,200,11 (VyV_II,200,11_II,200,21)

(“yaśca sannanumeye tatsamānāsamānaja tīyayorasanneva so 'nyatarāsiddho 'nadhyavasāyahetutvād anadhyavalitaḥ । yathā, sata kāryama utpattaḥ iti । ayam apramiddho 'napadeśa iti vacanādavaruddhaḥ ।”)

II,200,14

(“nanu cāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ saṃśayaheturabhihitaḥ śāstra tulyajātīyeṣvarthāntara bhūteṣu viśeṣasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvāditi ? na, anyārthatvāt । śabde viśeṣa darśanāt saṃśayānutpattirityukta nāyaṃ dravyādīnāmanyatamasya viśeṣaḥ sthācchāvaṇatvam, kintu sāmānyameva sampadyate । kasmāt ? tulyajātīya varthāntarabhūteṣu vyādibhedānām ekaikaśo viśeṣasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvā dityuktaṃ na saṃśayakāraṇam । anyathā ṣaṭsvapi padārtheṣu saṃśayaprasaṅgāt । tasmāt sāmānya pratyayādeva saṃśaya iti ।”)

II,200,21

samastasapakṣe tu asādhāraṇasyānadhyavasitvamāha * yaśca sannanumaya tatsamānāsamānajātīyayoḥ * sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ । 5 asanneva(ca?) so 'nyatarā siddho 'nadhyavasāyahetutvāt * niścayānupādakatvāt । atastaddhetutvād * ana dhyavasitaḥ * । * yathā sat kāryam utpatteḥ 5 ityudāharaṇam । sakala kāya mutpatteḥ prāk sadanu?dutpadyamānatvāditi hetarna pratyā?ākāśādā nāpi kharaviṣāṇādāvityanadhyavasitaḥ

II,201,1 (VyV_II,201,1^1) (VyV_II,201,1^2) (VyV_II,201,1^3)

na cāsya sūtreṇāsaṅgraha ityāha * “ayamaprasiddho 'napadeśaḥ” iti vacanādavaruddhaḥ * sapakṣavipakṣayoraprasiddhatvāditi । evamasādhāraṇasya saśayahetutve niraste satravirodhamadabhāvayannāha nanu cāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ saṃśaya māhataḥ śāstre, talyajātīyeṣu * sapakṣeṣu । * arthāntarabhūteṣu vipakṣaṣu | ca । * viśeṣasya * asādhāraṇadharmasya । * ubhayathā । * sapakṣe vipakṣe ca daṣṭatvāta iti । anenāsādhāraṇasya saśaya samityāṅakyāha * na * । sūtrasya , anyārthatvāta- sattāsambandhi । athaśabdavācyatvācca kiṃ dravyaṃ gaṇaḥ karma vā śabda iti saṃśayaḥ । na sambandhāt, śrāvaṇatvācca *ityakte* sūtrakāreṇa, paro brūte viśeṣasyopalabdhaḥ kathaṃ śabde saṃśaya ityāśaṅakyāha * masya* iti । na dravyasya gaṇasya karmaṇo vā viśeṣaḥ śrāvaṇatvam । sāmānyameva sampadyate । kasmāta ? * yasmāta guṇatve śabdasya sādhye sāyaṣu* rūpādiṣa śaklatvādiviśeṣo guṇatvena sahacarito dṛṣṭaḥ । paraṃ sattāsambandhāt, nāmanyatamasya * iti । *tulyajātīyeṣu * rūpādiṣu 2 * arthāntarabhūteṣa * (ca?) utkṣepaṇādiṣu viśeṣo dṛṣṭastathā pṛtha bhedānām * draya dṛṣṭatvāt dravyatvaguṇa śrāvaṇatvaṃ viśeṣastad dravyatvādivi sato 'yaṃ viśeṣaḥ śrāvaṇatvam, guṇasya kāraṇaṃ śrāvaṇatvam, na tu asa dhāraṇadharmopalabdhau * sa saṃśayakāraṇatvam anvayavyā na ca sarvasmād vyāvṛtta bhāvāt saṃśayo yuktaḥ, sadbhāva bhāvāt । * tasmāt sāmāna bhūtaṣu * (ca?) utkṣepaṇādiṣu karmatvena sahacarita utkṣepaṇatvādi dṛṣṭastathā pṛthivyādiṣu pṛthivītvādivyatveneti । * dravyādi "* dravyagaṇakarmaṇāma । * ekaikaśaḥ * pratyekam । * kaikaśaḥ pratyekama । viśeṣasyobhayathā vara * dravyatvaguṇatvādisahacaritasya dṛṣṭatvāt । upalabhyate ca śabde viśaṣastad dravyatvādiviṣayaṃ smaraṇaṃ bhavatyeva । ataḥ kiṃ dravyasya paḥ śrāvaṇatvam, guṇasya karmaṇo vā, ityuktena nyāyena saṃśaya ṇatvam, na tu asādhāraṇatvena । * ṣaṭsvapi padārtheṣu * asā palabdhau * saṃśayaprasaṃṅgāt * । utkṣepaṇatvādiviśeṣānupalabdheśca svam anvayavyatirekābhyāmupalabdham na tadupalabdheḥ ।

II,201,23 (VyV_II,201,23_II,202,2)

na ca sarvasmād vyāvattaṃ viśeṣamupalabhamānasya viruddhaviśeṣānasmatera sayā yuktaḥ, sadabhāve 'pyanucchedaḥ syāta, nirṇayotpattikāraṇā tasmāt sāmānyapratyakṣādeva saṃśayaḥ * na viśeṣadarśanādityupasaṃhāraḥ ।

II,201,26

yad vā viśeṣavattvasyobhayathā sapakṣavipakṣāviśeṣitasyopalabdhestadūpalambhā saṃśayaḥ । na saṃśayakāraṇam asādhāraṇo dharmaḥ, ṣaṭsvapi padārtheṣu saṃśayaprasaṅgāditi । śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ।

II,202,2

(“dvividhaṃ nidarśanaṃ sādharmeṇa vaidharyeṇa ca । tatra anumeyasāmānyena liṅgasāmānyasyānuvidhānadarśanaṃ sādharmyanidarśanam । tad yathā, yad yat kiyāvat tat tad dravyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā śara iti । anumeyaviparyaye ca liṅgasyā bhāvadarśanaṃ vaidharmyanidarśanam । tad yathā, yad yad adravyaṃ tat tat kriyāvanna bhavati yathā satteti ।”)

II,202,7 (VyV_II,202,7)

athāpadeśānantaraṃ nidarśanasvarūpanirūpaṇārtham * dvividhaṃ nidarśanam * ityādi prakaraṇam । dvividhamiti vibhāgo nidarśanamiti niruktilakṣaṇam । nidarśyate sādhyasādhanayorbahivyāptirasmin iti nidarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ । tathā nidarśāte sādhyasādhanayorvyāptiraneneti nidarśanaṃ vyāptipratipādakaṃ dṛṣṭānta vacanam । tathā hi, nidarśanam itarasmād bhidyate yathoktadṛṣṭāntavacanatvāt, yastu na bhidyate na cāsāvevaṃ yathā pratijñādiriti ।

II,202,13 (VyV_II,202,13_II,202,27)

tat kena rūpeṇa dvividham ? * sādharmyaṇa vaidhayeṇa ca * iti । * tatrā numeyasāmānyena * sādhyasāmānyena । * liṅgasāmānyasya * sādhanasāmānyasya । * anuvidhānadarśana sādharmyanidarśanam * । sādhanasāmānyaṃ vyāpyam, vyāpaka ca sādhyasāmānyamiti । * yad yat kriyāvat tattad dravyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā śaraḥ * ityudāharaṇam । atra hi dravyatvavyāptau kriyāvattvaṃ sādhanamastīti । * anumeyaviparyaye * sādhyaviparyaye, * liṅgasya * sādhanasya, * abhāvadaśana vaidharmyanidarśanam tadyathā〈〉 yad yad adravyaṃ tat tat kriyāvanna bhavati । yathā satteti * । sattāyāṃ hi dravyatvavyāvṛtyā kriyāvattvavyāvṛttirastāva vaidharyodāharaṇam ।

II,202,22

(“anena nidarśanābhāsā nirastā bhavanti । tad yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrtatvāt yad amūrta dṛṣṭaṃ tannityam, yathā paramāṇuḥ, yathā kameṃ, yā sthālī, yathā tamaḥ ambaravaditi । yad yad dravyaṃ tat tat kriyāvara dṛṣṭamiti ca liṅgānumeyobhayāśrayāsiddhānanugataviparītānugata sādhamyanidarśanābhāsāḥ ।”)

II,202,27

(“yadanityaṃ tanmataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā karma, yathā paramāṇaḥ, yathākāśaṃ yathā tamaḥ ghaṭavat, yaniṣkriyaṃ tada adravyaṃ dṛṣṭañceti liṅgānumeyobhayāvyā tāśrayāsiddhāvyāvṛttaviparītavyāvattā vedharmyanidarśanābhāsā iti ।”)

II,203,3 (VyV_II,203,3)

* anena 〈nidarśanābhāsāḥ nidarśanavadābhāsanta iti nidarśanābhā satsamānadharmāṇaḥ । * nirastā bhavanti - iti svavākye parivarjanārthaṃ para 14 cādbhāvanārthaṃ nirūpyante । tad yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amṛtatvāta, yad amūrta dṛṣṭaṃ tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ?〉 yathā paramāṇuḥ * iti । sādhanasyā tya paramāṇāvabhāvāta sādhanavikalamudāharaṇam । asminneva sādhye kamāta' sādhyavikalam, nityatvasya karmaṇyabhāvāt । “yathā sthālo” sāpakalam, nityatvasyāmūrtatvasya ca sthālyāmabhāvāt । “yathā tamaḥ” " māsiddham, sāṃkhyābhyupagatasya tamasoprasiddhatvāt । “ambaravat” iti sāvyasādhanādhikaraṇatve 'pi ani nagato vacanadoṣaḥ । yad yad amūrta dṛṣṭaṃ natya dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ambaramiti vacanaṃ vinā anugatasyāpratīteḥ ।

II,203,13 (VyV_II,203,13_II,203,15)

yad vā samyagdṛṣṭānto 'pi ākāśāsattvavādino na sādhyasiddhi karāti yāvanna pramāṇato vyavasthāpyata ityābhāsa ucyā tājñāpanārtham । itthambhūta iti ।

II,203,15

anye tu ābhāsāvasare samyagadṛṣṭāntopadarśanam ābhāsānām ābhāsa "m । itthambhūtaṃ hi nidarśanam, etatpratirūpakāṇi ca tadābhāsā tathā vyāpyavyāpakabhāvapratipatti dravyatvopalabdheḥ । samavyāptike 'pi pattirna syāditidūṣaṇa

II,203,18 (VyV_II,203,18)

yad yad dravyaṃ tattat kriyāvad dṛṣṭam * iti ca vipa atā dravyatvaṃ vyāpyaṃ kiyāvattvañca vyāpakaṃ syādāta * māvapratipattiḥ । na caitadasti. ākāśādau kriyāvattvaṃ vināpi yaḥ । samavyāpti ke 'pi sādhanasya vyāpakatvābhidhāne sādhyasya prati dātadūṣaṇam । viṣamavyāptike viparītānugamo doṣo na samavyāptike " । atropasaṃhāravākyaṃ liñca. anameyaśca. ubhayañca, āśrayaśceti pāśrayāḥ, te asiddhā yeṣu ābhāseṣu te tathoktāḥ, te ca ananu rātānugatāśceti * liṅgānumeyobhayāśrayāsiddhānanugataviparītāna iti cānye । atropasaṃhāravā jānumeyobhayāśrayāḥ, te asiddhā yeṣu ābhāsa "tāḥ sādharmyanidarśanābhāsāḥ ।

II,204,1 (VyV_II,204,1^1) (VyV_II,204,1^2_II,204,17)

vaidharmyanidarśanābhāsān darśayati * yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā karma * iti sādhanāvyāvṛttam, tasya hi amūrtatvāditi । tasminneva sādhye “yathā paramāṇuḥ” iti sādhyāvyāvṛttaṃ vyatirekodāharaṇam, paramāṇonityatvāditi । “yathā ākāśam” ityubhayāvyāvṛttam, amūrtatvasya nityatvasya ca tatrāvyāvṛtti riti । “yathā tamaḥ” iti dharmāsiddham, sāṃkhyābhyupagatasya tamaso 'prasiddhatvā diti । “ghaṭavat” ityubhayāvyāvṛttāvapi avyatirekaḥ, yad yannityaṃ na bhavati tattadamṛtaṃ na bhavatīti vacanaṃ vinā vyatirekasyāpratipatteḥ । ghaṭāsattvavādino vā pramāṇenāpratipādito na sādhyasiddhi karotīti ābhāsa ucyate, * yanniṣkriyaṃ tad adravyaṃ dṛṣṭam * iti vyatirekaḥ । sādhyavyāvṛttyā hi sādhana vyāvṛttirvācyā, na tu sādhanavyāvṛttyā sādhyavyāvṛttiḥ, kriyāvattvābhāve 'pi ākāśādau dravyatvasya sādhyasyāvyāvṛtteḥ, sādhanābhāvo hi vyāpakaḥ sādhyā bhāvo vyāpya iti । eteṣāmupasaṃhāraḥ, liṅgacca, anumeyaśca, ubhayañceti liṅgānumeyobhayāni, tāni avyāvṛttāni yeṣu ābhāseṣu te liṅgānumeyo bhayāvyāvṛttāḥ, te ca āśrayāsiddhañca avyāvṛttañca viparītavyāvṛttañceti * liṅgānumeyobhayāvyāvṛttāśrayāsiddhāvyāvṛttaviparītavyāvṛttā vaidharmyani darśanābhāsāḥ * iti ।

II,204,17

(“nidarśane 'numeyasāmānyena saha dṛṣṭasya liṅgasāmānyasya anumeye 'nvānayanamanusandhānam । anumeyadharmamātratvenābhihitaṃ liṅgasāmāndhamanu palabdhaśaktikaṃ nidarśane anumeyadharmasāmānyena saha dṛṣṭam anumeye yena vacanenānusandhīyate tadanusandhānam । tathā ca vāyuḥ kriyāvāniti । anumeyābhāve ca tasyāsattvamupalabhya, na ca tathā vāyuniṣkriya iti ।”)

II,204,22 (VyV_II,204,22)

evaṃ saha ābhāsainidarśanamupadarthya anusandhānanirūpaṇārthamāha * nidarśane 'numeyasāmānyena saha * ityādi । * nidarśane * dṛṣṭānte । * anumeyasāmānyena * sādhyasāmānyena । * saha dṛṣṭasya liṅgasāmānyasya anumeye * pakṣe । * anvānayana manusandhānam * । ānayanaṃ pratipādanamanyasyāpi sambhavatīti liṅgasyeti padam । tathāpi liṅgasya nidarśane pratipādanamastīti tadvyudāsāya anumeyapadam । anumeye ca gṛhītāvinābhāvasya liṅgasya pratipādakaṃ hetuvacanamapīti nidarśane'numeyasāmānyena saha dṛṣṭasya liṅgasāmānyasyeti padam । ataḥ anusandhāna mitarasmād bhidyate nidarśane gṛhītavyāptikasya liṅgasyānumeye 'nvānayana rūpatvāt, yastu na bhidyate na cāsāvevaṃ yathā pratijñādiriti ।

II,205,4 (VyV_II,205,4)

saṅgrahoktevivaraṇamāha * anumeyadharmamātratvenābhihitaṃ liṅgasāmānyam * na tu samarthamiti mātrābhidhānena darśayati । * anupalabdhaśaktikam * iti । anupalabdhā śaktiravinābhāvo yasya tat tathoktam । punaḥ * nidarśane 'numeya dharmasāmānyena saha dṛṣṭam * । 〈〉anumeye pakṣe yena vacanena “anu” paścāt sandhīyate pakṣadharmatayā khyāpyate tad anusandhānam ।

II,205,9 (VyV_II,205,9)

tadapi dvividham, sādharmyaṇa vaidharyeṇa ca । tatra anumeyasāmānyena saha liṅgasāmānyasya nidarśane sattvamupalabhyābhisandhatte tathā cāyaṃ kriyāvān vāyu riti । vaidharmyanidarśane tu anumeyasya dravyatvasyābhāve ca tasya kriyāvattvasyā sattvamupalabhya na ca tathā vāyuniṣkriya ityupasaṃhāraḥ । niṣkriyatvapratiṣedhena kriyāvattvamupasaṃharatīti । pṛthagvacanantu pratiṣedhābhiprāyeṇaiva ।

II,205,14 (VyV_II,205,14)

nanu vyarthamanusandhānavacanam, tadantareṇāpi hetuvacanād gṛhītavyāptikāt sādhyasiddheḥ ? na, anena vinā abādhitaviṣayatvasyāpratipatteḥ । hetuvacanantu kāraṇamātropasthāpakam, na tu gṛhītavyāptikasya antarvyāptipratipādaka miti । yathābhūtena dravyatvāvinābhāvinā pramāṇāntarāviruddhena kriyāvattvena kriyāvān karaḥ, tathā ca vāyurityantāptipratipattiḥ । tadabhāve tu bahirvyāpti sadbhāve 'pi na gamakatvam । yathā śabdasya anityatve sādhye sāmānyavattve sati cākṣuṣapratyakṣaḥ, tasya kālātyayāpadiṣṭa〈 sya?tvaṃ〉 ceti । ata evātropanayavacanaṃ na nirviṣayatvādapramāṇam ।

II,205,22 (VyV_II,205,22)

na copasaṃhāra vinā dharmiviśeṣeṇa sambandhāprasiddhau tatraiva sādhyaviśeṣa pratipattiḥ syāt । svārthānumānakāle ca upanayārthasyopalabdheḥ kārya tad vacanam, svapratipattyanusāreṇa parārthānumānapravṛtteḥ । na ca svapratipattāvetasyā satvam, avinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇānantaraṃ parāmaśaṃjñānasyānubhavāt । anabhyu pagame ca sambandhasmaraṇasyāniyatatvāt niyatapradeśe pratipattirna syādityuktam ।

II,206,1 (VyV_II,206,1_II,206,7)

tasmād ayamityaparokṣatānirdeśasyāvinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇānantara mupalabdharasti parāmarśajñānam, atastadupanyāsārtha kāryamanusandhānavacanamiti ।

II,206,3

(“anumeyatvenoddiṣṭe cāniścite ca pareṣāṃ niścayāpādanārtha pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ pratyāmnāyaḥ । pratipādyatvenoddiṣṭe cāniścite ca pareṣāṃ hetvādibhiravayavairāhitaśaktīnāṃ parisamāptena vākyena niścayā pādanātha pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanaṃ pratyāmnāyaḥ, tasmād dravyameveti ।”)

II,206,7

atha pratyāmnāyasvarūpopadarśanārtham * anumeyatvenoddiṣṭe * ityādi prakaraṇam । * anumeyatvena * anumānayogyatvena । * uddiṣṭe cāniścite ca pareṣām * saṃśayitaviparyastāvyutpannānām । punaḥ * niścayāpādanārthaṃ pratijñāyāḥ 〈〉punaḥ vacanaṃ pratyāmnāyaḥ ।

II,206,11 (VyV_II,206,11)

saṅgrahoktevivaraṇamāha anumeye dharmamātre * pratipādyatvena * sādhyatvena, * uddiṣṭe cāniścite ca pareṣām * । kiṃ viśiṣṭānām ? * hetvādibhira 〈?vayavairā〉 hitaśaktīnām * iti । āhitā śaktiravinābhāvo yasya liṅgasya yastaistathoktaisteṣām । etasmāt sādhanād bhaviṣyati sādhyasiddhirityava kṛtāsthānāmiti bhāvaḥ । * niścayāpādanārthaṃ pratijñāyāḥ punarvacana pratyāmnāyaḥ * iti । punaruktamātravyavacchedārtha pratijñāyāḥ punarvacanamiti padam । tathāpi anityaḥ śabdo 'nityaḥ śabda iti punaruktavyu dāsārthaṃ niścayā pādanārthamiti padam । avipratipannasya etasmādapi niścayo bhavatīti tadaya pareṣāmiti । tathāpi teṣāṃ madhye kasyacid ekāvayavopadarśanena anvayavyātara kānusmaraṇadvāreṇa arthapratipattirbhavatīti * parisamāptena vākyena * iti grahaṇam । yasminnavayave sati vākyaṃ parisamāpyata iti । tadevaṃ pratyāmnāya. itarasmād bhidyate yathoktalakṣaṇatvāditi ।

II,206,23 (VyV_II,206,23)

nanu pratijñāvacanasya tu vināśitvena avasthānāsambhavāt kathaṃ punarvacana miti ? tatsamānaśabdoccāraṇāt । yathā kṣaṇikatve 'pi karmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ samānāmi nayakaraṇāt punarnṛtyatīti vyapadeśastadvat pratijñāsamāna śabdaprayogakaraṇāra punarvacanabhiti vyapadeśo bhavatyeva । atiśaye “pūnaḥ”śabdo vivakṣita । pratijñā pakṣastasya punarvacanaṃ ghaṭata eva ।

II,207,1 (VyV_II,207,1_II,207,5)

liṅgavākyārthavādinastu pratijñāyate 'neneti pratijñā liṅgaṃ tasya punarvacanaṃ pratyāmnāya iti ।

II,207,3

udāharaṇantu * tasmād dravyameveti * । etena adravyatvapratipādaka pramāṇābhāvo 'pyupadarśita eva ।

II,207,5

atha vyarthaṃ pratyāmnāyavacanam, sambandhābhidhānādeva vivakṣitārthaprasiddhaḥ । taduktam,

II,207,7 (VyV_II,207,7_II,208,11)

'ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajyākṣiṇī nimīlya cintaya tāvat kiṃ iyatārtha māttabhavati naveti । yadi iha bhavati kimanayā śabdamālayā ?na bhavatīti - vācyaṃ dṛṣṭatvāt' <= hetubinduḥ, baḍodā, pṛṣṭha. 56>

II,207,10

natadevaṃ, pratijñāvacanaṃ vinā anvayanyatirekāprasidvau sambandhābhidhāna syāgamakatvena pūrvameva vyavasthāpitatvāt ।

II,207,12

(“ne hyetasminnasati pareṣāmavayavānāṃ samastānāṃ vyastānāṃ vā tadartha pakatvamasti । gamyamānārthatvāditi cenna, atiprasaṅgāta । tathā hi. śānantaraṃ hetumātrābhidhānaṃ kartavyam, viduṣāmanvayavyatirekasmaraṇāta vigāṃtarbhaviṣyatīti । tasmādatraivārthaparisamāptiḥ ।”)

II,208,1

(“katham ? anitya śabdaḥ ityanena aniścitānityatvamātraviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ kathyate । prayatnānantarīyakatvādityanena anityatvasādhanaṃ dharmamātra mabhidhīyate । iha yat prayatnānantarīyakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ghaṭa ityanena sādhyasāmānyena sādhanasāmānyasya anagamamātramucyate । nityam aprayatnānantarīyakaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ākāśama ityanena sādhyābhāvena saha sādhanasya asattvaṃ pradarśyate । tathā ca prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdo dṛṣṭaḥ, na ca tathā ākāśavadaprayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabda ityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ dṛṣṭa sāmarthyasya sādhanasāmānyasya śabdenasandhānaṃ gamyate । tasmād aninyaḥ śabda ityanena anitya eva śabda iti pratipipādayiṣitārthaparisamāpti rgamyate ।”)

II,208,11

(“tasmāt pañcāvayavenaiva vākyena pareṣāṃ svaniścitārthapratipādana kiyata ityetat parārthānumānaṃ siddha miti ।”)

II,208,13 (VyV_II,208,13)

atha pratijñāderevārthapratipādakatvamastu, kiṃ pratyāmnāyena, tathā hi, pratijñāvacanaiviṣayavyavasthāpanād hetūdāharaṇābhyāṃ vahirvyāptiprasiddhau upanaya nāntaryāptyupadarśane sati avaśyamabhipretārthasiddhiriti । satyametata, tathāpi avaśyambhāvino 'rthasya pratijñādinā pratipāditasya pratipādanārthamavaśyaṃ kāya nigamanamityāha * na hyetasmin * iti । na pūrveṣāmavayavānāṃ samastānā tadarthavācakatvamasti । vyastānāmitaretaravyāvṛttasvārthavyavasthāpane caritāya tvamityanyadato vācyaṃ yasya sahakāriṇāṃ pūrvapadānāṃ samastānāmapi smṛtyupa sthāpitānāṃ vākyārthapratipādakatvamiti ।

II,208,21 (VyV_II,208,21)

atha sādhanasya antarvyāptibahirvyāptyabhidhāne sati sādhyaviśeṣo gamya evetyāha * gamyamānārthatvāditi cenna, atiprasaṅgāta । tathā hi, pratijñāna hetumātrābhidhānaṃ kartavyam * svata eva viduṣāṃ hetūpalambhe sati anvayamā rekānusmaraṇaṃ, tasmāccādhigatirbhaviṣyatīti viśeṣābhidhānavaiyayaṃ syāt ।

II,208,25 (VyV_II,208,25)

atha paraṃ pratipādayatā vacanenaiva pratipādana kāryamiti śeṣāṇā prayā hi vākyārthapratipādanārthaṃ nigamanamapi kāryama । na ca pratipādyāmitrā prayogo yuktaḥ, tasya manuṣyadharmaṇā sākṣādapratīteravyavasthāpanācca । tathā hi, kāścadekasmādeva avayavādarthaṃ pratipadyate, kaścid dvābhyām, anyastribhiritya navasthitatvāt pratipādyānāṃ tadabhiprāyāniścaye prayogānupapattireva syāt । ataḥ paraṃ pratipādayatā svapratipattyupāyopadarśanaṃ kāryamiti pañcānāṃ prayogo purataḥ । tathā hi, pradeśasthaṃ dhamamupalabhya avinābhāvasambandhaṃ smṛtvā tathā pāya dhūmavāniti parāmṛśati, tataḥ sādhyaṃ pratipadyate tasmādagnimāniti jagamanārthasyāpyupalabdheḥ parapratipādanāya tadupanyāso yukta eveti pañcānāṃ bhāgaḥ kārya ityāha bhāṣyakāraḥ tasmādatraivārthaparisamāptiḥ iti ।

II,209,8 (VyV_II,209,8_II,209,10)

anye tu antarvyāptipratipādanārthaṃ nigamanamiti manyante । anusandhānāt vyāpakatvaprasiddhau viparītaprasaṅgapratiṣedhārthaṃ nigamanamiti ।

II,209,10

viparītārthavyavasthāpakapramāṇasyāprāmāṇyopadarśane sati pakṣe vyāptiḥ cāyata eva । yatra ca parapakṣāpratiṣedhastatra hetonaṃ gamakatvam । yathā mūryo 'tatputratvāt upalabhyamānatatputravaditi । atra hi tatputrasya amūrkhatve na cad bādhakamastīti tatsādhakapramāṇābhāvaśca niścita eveti anyathāsiddhaṃ sādhanametat ।

II,209,15 (VyV_II,209,15)

athāvinābhūtasya pramāṇavirodhābhāvāna yuktaṃ viparītapramāṇasyāprāmā padaśanamiti cenna, tadantareṇāvinābhāvasyaivāprasiddheḥ । tathā hi, nityatva "pādakapramāṇasya prāmāṇye sati na śabde kṛtakatvasyānityatvena vyāptiḥ yādāta । na ca parapakṣapratiṣedhakādeva svapakṣasiddhiḥ, vyadhikaraṇatvāt, vārāpa vaiyarthyaprasaṅgācceti । parapakṣapratiṣedhe tūpadarśitabahirvyāptikaṃ pakṣe palabhyamānaṃ bhavatyeva sādhanamiti nigamanaprayogaḥ kāryaḥ ।

II,209,21 (VyV_II,209,21)

atha pratijñāvacanameva parapakṣapratiṣedhasahāyaṃ sādhanamiti cenna, tasya mātrābhidhāyakatvāta, sādhyama iti arhatyarthe, śakyārthe vā kṛtya?tābhi " katha tadvacanāt tasya siddhiḥ? tasmād bahirvyāptivadantāpti samarthayatā taviṣayatvāsatpratipakṣatvapratipādanārthameva avayavāntaramabhidheyam ।

II,209,25 (VyV_II,209,25)

atha prakaraṇasamakālātyāpadiṣṭayorapi bahirvyāptisabhāvāt gamakatvaṃ , bhasti ca tayoḥ pakṣavyāpakatve satyanvayavyatirekasadbhāva iti ? ayukta〈metat,〉 tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇapratibandhāyattastu avyabhicāro na bhavatī tyuktaṃ vyāptisamarthanāvasare । tasmāduktanyāyena atraivārthaparisamāptiriti ।

II,210,3 (VyV_II,210,3^1) (VyV_II,210,3^2_II,210,17)

evaṃ vibhinnaprakaraṇeṣu avayavānāṃ svarūpopadarśane 'pi ekatra tatsvarūpa parijñānāpekṣayā praśnaḥ * katham * iti । * anityaḥ śabda ityanana aniścitānityatvamātraviśiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ kathyate * iti pratijñaiṣā । * prayatnā nantarīyakatvādityanena anityatvasādhanadharmamātramabhidhīyate * na tu samarthamiti hetuvacanam । * iha yat prayatnānantarīyakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭa ityanena sādhyasāmānyena (saha ?) sādhanasāmānyasyānugamamātramucyate * hāta sādharyodāharaṇam । * nityam aprayatnānantarīyakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ākāśam ityanena sādhyābhāvena saha sādhanasyāsattvaṃ vyākhyāyate ? pradaśyate * śata vaidharyodāharaṇam । * tathā ca prayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdaḥ * na ca tathā prayatnā nantarīyako na bhavatīti, * anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ dṛṣṭasāmarthyasya sādhanasāmānya sya śabde 'nusandhāna gamyate । tasmādanityaḥ eva ? śabdaḥ ityanana anitya eva śabda iti pratipipādayiṣitārthaparisamāptirgamyate* ityabhipretātha siddhirbhavatīti । ataḥ * pañcāvayavenaiva vākyena pareṣāṃ svaniścitārthaprati pādanaṃ kriyate iti siddham ।

II,210,17

atra ca śabdaviśeṣasya pakṣīkaraṇe prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ sādhanaṃ vivakṣita miti jñeyam । anyathā hi śabdamātraparigrahe prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ bhāgāsincha syāt । na hi prayatnānantaraṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ janmāstīti ।

§ nirṇayavaidharmyam

II,210,21 (VyV_II,210,21_II,211,3)

(“viśeṣadarśanajamavadhāraṇajñānaṃ saṃśayavirodhī nirṇayaḥ । etadana pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā । yadviśeṣadarśanāta saṃśayavirodhyutpadyate sa pratyā nirṇayaḥ । yathā sthāṇupuruṣayorūrvatāmātrasādṛśyālocanād viśeṣa pratyakṣeṣu ubhayaviśeṣānusmaraṇāt kimayaṃ sthāṇuḥ puruṣo 1 saṃśayotpattau 〈satyāṃ?〉 śiraḥpāṇyādi 〈〉viśeṣa? darśanāta puruṣa evāmitva vadhāraṇajñānaṃ pratyakṣanirṇayaḥ ।”)

II,211,1

(“viṣāṇamātradarśanād gaurgavayo veti saṃśayotpattau sāsnāmātradarśanāda gorevāyamityavadhāraṇajñālamanumānanirṇayaḥ ।”)

II,211,3

atha nirṇayo vidyāntaramiti kecit । taniṣedhārthaṃ * viśeṣadarśanajam - ityādi prakaraṇam । parārthānumānānantaramasyāntarbhāvanirūpaṇamatrāpi antarbhāva śāpanārtham । nirṇaya iti lakṣyanirdeśo 'vaśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇam । avadhāraṇajñānaṃ hi viṣayayajñānamapi bhavati na tu viśeṣadarśanājjāyate । viśeṣadarśanajaṃ cobha ? ca saṃśa〈〉 yajñānamapītyavadhāraṇagrahaṇam ।

II,211,8 (VyV_II,211,8)

tathāpi viśeṣadarśanajamavadhāraṇajñānaṃ nirṇaya ityukte vyabhicārābhāvād saṃśayavirodhīti padam ? na, viśiṣṭanirṇayalakṣaṇārthatvāt । yadyapi padarśanajamavadhāraṇajñānamiti sakalanirṇayavyāpīdaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tathāpi virodhīti padaṃ saṃśayapūrvakasya nirṇayasya lakṣaṇārtham । tathā ca naiyāyikai vimṛśya pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmarthāvadhāraṇaṃ nirṇayaḥ' <= nyā. sū. 1.1.41> taśayapūrvakasya lakṣaṇam । vimṛśyeti vimarśa kṛtvā, pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmiti nābhyām, sa punaḥ sādhanadūṣaṇābhyāṃ nirṇaya iti ।

II,211,15 (VyV_II,211,15_II,211,17)

atha viśeṣadarśanāt saṃśayo vyāvartate, na nirṇayāditi kathaṃ tadvirodhitvam । upacāreṇa, nirṇayakāraṇasya saṃśayavirodhitvāt nirṇayastavirodhītyuktam ।

II,211,17

asyāntarbhāvamāha * etadeva pratyakṣamanumānaṃ vā * na jñānāntaram । sāmagnījanyaṃ hi pratyakṣamanumānasāmagrījanyantu anumānamiti । * yad daśanāt saṃśayavirodhyutpadyate sa nirṇayaḥ * iti prāktanasya vivaraṇam । viśeṣadarśanāt saṃśayā

II,211,21 (VyV_II,211,21)

atra * sthāṇupuruṣayorūlatāmātrasādṛśyālocanād viśeṣaṣvapratyakṣeṣūbhaya pānusmaraṇāt - 〈kimayaṃ〉 sthāṇuḥ puruṣo veti saṃśayotpattau satyāṃ śiraḥ pāṇyādiviśeṣadarśanāt puruṣa evāyamityavadhāraṇajñānam indriyārthasannikarṣā ta. pratyakṣanirṇayaḥ । * viṣāṇamātradarśanāt * iti piṇḍavyavadhāne 'pi " syāvaśiṣṭaviṣāṇadarśanāt । *gaurgavayo veti saṃśayotpattau satyām । sāsnāmātradarśanāt * avinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇe sati parāmarśajñānānantaram । ravāyamityavadhāraṇajñānaṃ anumānanirṇayaḥ ।

§ smṛtivaidharmyam

II,212,2 (VyV_II,212,2_II,212,5)

(“liṅgadarśanecchānusmaraṇādyapekṣādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣāt paṭva bhyāsādarapratyayajanitācca saṃskārād dṛṣṭaśrutānubhūteṣvartheṣu śeṣānuvyava sāyānusmaraṇecchādveṣaheturatītaviṣayā smṛtiriti ।”)

II,212,5

atha smṛteḥ kāryakāraṇaviṣayasvarūpanirūpaṇārthaṃ *liṅgadarśanecchānu । smaraṇādyapekṣāt * ityādi prakaraṇam । liṅgadarśanecchānusmaraṇādyapekṣāt * . liṅgadarśanañca icchā ca anusmaraṇañceti tathoktāni, tānyādiryeṣāmityādi padena praṇidhānādergrahaṇam, tānyapekṣata iti tadapekṣastasmāta । * ātmamanasā saṃyogaviśeṣāt * ityasamavāyikāraṇanirdeśaḥ । liṅgadarśanecchānusmaraṇādha pekṣāt * paṭavabhyāsādarapratyayajanitācca saṃskārāt * iti nimittakāraṇa nirdeśaḥ । * dṛṣṭaśrutānubhūteṣvartheṣu * iti dṛṣṭaḥ pratyakṣeṇa, śrutaḥ śabdena, anubhūtā 'numānena ।

II,212,13 (VyV_II,212,13_II,212,19)

anye tu dṛṣṭaścakṣuṣā, anubhūtastvagindriyeṇeti ।

II,212,14

tatra liṅgaṃ darśayati * śeṣānuvyavasāyānusmaraṇecchādveṣahetuḥ * iti । upayuktālliṅgād anumeyaḥ śeṣaḥ, so 'nuvyavasīyate aneneti śeṣānuvyavasāya parāmarśajñānam, tasya heturavinābhāvasambandhasmaraṇam, tathā padasmaraṇā vākyasmaraṇam, sukhasmaraṇādiccho duḥkhasmaraṇāda dveṣa iti । * atītaviṣayā * iti svarūpakathanam । atīto viṣayo yasyāḥ sā tathokteti ।

II,212,19

nanvayuktametat, vidyamāne 'pi vastuni smaraṇasya darśanādityavyāta, ativyāptiśca anumānāderatītaviṣayatvāditi ।

II,212,21 (VyV_II,212,21)

atha codanaiva bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ viprakṛṣṭādikamarthaṃ prakāśayati nātha kiñcana indriyādikamiti cenna, anamānasyāpi atītādyarthaprakāśana palambhāt । tathā ca, meghonnatyā bhaviṣyati vṛṣṭirityanumīyate, nadāpūra viśiṣṭād upariṣṭād vṛṣṭirityuktam । pratyakṣañcātra avinābhāvagrāhaka yam, anyathā vyāptigrahaṇābhāve 'numānameva na pravarteta । na cānumānanā bhāvagrahaṇam, anavasthāprasaṅgāt । vartamānena cāvinābhāvagrahaṇe katham atītādyarthānumānaṃ syāt, anyenāvinābhāvagrahaṇe 'nyasyānumitau atiprasaṅgāt । tasmādatītaviṣayatvaṃ vyākhyeyampacāreṇa । yatra hi viṣaye 'nubhavo 'tītastatra smṛtirutpadyata iti ।

II,213,4 (VyV_II,213,4_II,213,7)

anye tu atīto vyavahito viṣayo yasyānubhavasyāsau atītaviṣayaḥ, saviṣayo yasyāḥ sā atītaviṣayeti prāpte sati ekasya viṣayasya lopo draṣṭavya ityatītānubhavaviṣayatvaṃ labhyata iti manyante ।

II,213,7

atha arthajatvameva smateḥ kasmānneṣyate ? arthavināśe 'pyutpādāt । 1 yaddaśakālāliṅgite 'nabhavajñānamatpannaṃ tadālambanameva nyāyyam, smṛtikāle tasyāvidyamānatayā viṣayatvābhāvāt । bāhyendriyāṇāñca smṛtijanmani 7 vyābhacārādantaḥkaraṇasya vyāpāro niścīyate । na ca tasya svātantryeṇa bāhaviṣaye vyāpāraḥ sambhavatīti anarthajatvameva nyāyyam । avaśyañca yatva sati avyabhicāritvādidharmopetatvāt pramārūpatāyāṃ smṛteḥ pramāṇā uttavācyā । anamānādeśca vyāpārānupalabdherantaḥkaraṇasya svātantryeṇa "uttiā prāmāṇye sati smateraparokṣatvaṃ syāta, na caitadasti, tasmāniviṣayatvameva ।

§ ārṣajñānavaidharmyam

II,213,17 (VyV_II,213,17_II,213,22^1)

(“āmnāyavidhātaṇāmṛṣīṇāmatītānāgatavartamāneṣvatīndriyeṣu dharmā dhu granthopanibaddheṣvanapanibaddheṣa ca ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogād dharmaviśeṣācca yat prātibhaṃ yathātmanivedanaṃ jñānamutpadyate tad ārṣamityācakṣate । " prastāreṇa devarṣīṇāma, kadācideva laukikānāma, yathā kanyakā pāta śvo me bhrātā āganteti hadayaṃ me kathayatīti ।”)

II,213,22

atha ārṣajñānasya kāraṇaviṣayapramāṇanirūpaṇārtham * āmnāyavidhāta "m * ityādi prakaraṇam । āmnāyo vedaḥ śrutismṛtilakṣaṇaḥ, tasya vidhātāraḥ katāraḥ, teṣāmṛṣīṇāmutpadyate * yat prātibhaṃ jñānam * iti pratibhayā kārāvaśeṣeṇa nirvatitama । yathātmanivedanam * yathā tasya padārtha mā svarūpaṃ tanivedanama tadālambanamutpadyate * tad ārṣamityācakṣate । keṣvartheṣūtpadyate ? * atītānāgatavartamāneṣu * । kiviśiṣṭeṣu ? * atīndriyeṣu dharmādiṣu * ādipadena paramāṇvādergrahaṇamiti । * granthopanibadveṣvanupanibaddheṣu ca * granthopanibaddheṣu ātmādiṣu〈〉, anupanivaddheṣu ca paramāṇvādiṣa iyān dharma iti । kutaḥ kāraṇādeṣu yathārthavijñānam ? * ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogāt * asamavāyinaḥ - dharmaviśeṣācca * nimittāditi । tatta prastāreṇa ṛṣīṇāma tastadārṣam । tattu kadācideva laukikānāmapyarṣīṇāmevaṃvidhaṃ vijñānamastīti । kima smadādīnāṃ?tra pramāṇamityāha * kadācideva lokikānām * tat prātibha jñānamiti । * yathā kanyakā bravīti śvo me bhrātā āganteti * । na cendriyaja tat, 〈〉tadvyāpāraṃ vināpyutpatteḥ ।

II,214,10 (VyV_II,214,10_II,214,19)

atha bāhyendriyāṇāṃ vyāpārāsambhave 'pi antaḥkaraṇasya vyāpārāt pratyakṣaphalatvam । sambandho 'pi indriyeṇa saha bhrātuḥ saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇaviśeṣya bhāvaḥ । tathā hi, tadviśiṣṭamātmānaṃ deśaṃ kālaṃ vā ālambyotpadyate jñāna metad ityuktaṃ paraiḥ । taccāsat, asyāparokṣatvānupa? patteḥ । yatra hi aparokṣajñānaṃ tatraiva indriyavyāpārakalpanā kriyate । na cātra tadastīti । na ca bahirviṣaye viśeṣaṇe 'pi manasaḥ svātantryeṇa vyāpāraḥ sambhavatītyuktam । liṅgaliṅgisambandhānusmaraṇānanubhavācca nānumānajam । śabda vināpyutpattana śābdam । ataḥ pramāṇāntaraphalametat । tathā praśne kṛte sati na pratyakṣādika nirdiśati, api tu - hṛdayaṃ me kathayatīti * brūte ।

II,214,19

atha kasmāt pratyakṣānumānānantaramārṣajñānasya na nirūpaṇam ? asmadādīnāṃ tena vyavahārābhāvāt । yatastattu prastāreṇa ṛṣīṇāmeva, kadācideva laukikānāmiti ।

§ siddhadarśanasya vidyāntaratvanirāsaḥ

II,214,23 (VyV_II,214,23_II,215,3)

(“siddha darśanaṃ na jñānāntaram । kasmāta ? prayatnapūrvakama añjanapādā pakhaḍgalikādisiddhānāṃ dṛśyadraṣṭaṇāṃ sukṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭaṣva yad darśanaṃ tatpratyakṣameva । atha divyāntarikṣabhaumānāṃ prāṇināṃ graha kṣatrasañcārādinimittaṃ dharmādharmavipākadarśanamiṣṭaṃ tadapyanumānameva । aba liṅgānapekṣaṃ dharmādiṣu darśanamiṣṭaṃ tadapi pratyakṣārṣayoranyatarasmina antaḥ bhūtamityevaṃ buddhiriti ।”)

II,215,3

siddhadarśanaṃ vidyāntaramiṣṭaṃ paraistaniṣedhārthamāha * siddhadarśanaṃ na śānāntaram * iti । ārṣajñānānantaramasya antarbhāvanirūpaṇam ārṣe 'pyanta nāvātham । yat siddhānāṃ darśanamutpadyate tatpratyakṣameva । keṣvartheṣu ? * sūkṣma pāhatāvaprakṛṣṭeṣu * iti । sūkṣmāḥ paramāṇavaḥ, vyavahitā nāgabhavanādayo dādāndriyāpekṣayā । na tu siddhendriyāṇāṃ vyavadhāyakamasti । viprakṛṣṭā pādayaḥ, teṣu । siddhānāṃ kiṃ viśiṣṭānām ? muktātmavyavacchedārthaṃ * dṛśya *ṇām * iti । kiñca teṣāṃ sadbhāve pramāṇamityāha dṛśyānām । cid añjanādiviyuktāḥ pratyakṣeṇāpyupalabhyante । kā punasteṣāṃ siddhirityāha janapādalepakhaḍagagalikādisiddhānāma iti । ādipadena cintāmaṇi vānā grahaṇam । añjanādivaśācca siddhendriyāṇāṃ sūkṣmādyarthaprakāśanam, ataḥ tat pratyakṣameva* 〈na〉 jñānāntaramiti ।

II,215,14 (VyV_II,215,14)

atha jyotiṣāmayanaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāṇināṃ śubhamaśubhaṃ vā bhaviṣyatīti jñānaṃ śāntaramiṣṭaṃ taniṣedhārtham * divyāntarikṣabhaumānām * ityādi । bhavaṃ divyamulkāpātādi, antarikṣe bhavañcāntarikṣaṃ digdāhādi, bhūmau bhāvaṃ bhaumaṃ bhūsañcalanādi, teṣām । * grahanakṣatrasañcārādinimittam * upalabhya prāṇināṃ dharmādharmayovipākaḥ phaladānasāmarthyaṃ taddarśanaṃ 〈na〉 jñānāntaramiṣṭam * tadapyanumānameva * liṅgadarśanānubandha smaraṇādijanyatvāt ।

II,215,20 (VyV_II,215,20_II,215,22)

yad vā divyāntarikṣabhaumānāṃ surasiddhamanuṣyāṇāṃ prāṇināṃ grahanakṣatra dinimittamupalabhya dharmādharmayovipākadarśana miṣṭaṃ tadapyanumānameveti ।

II,215,22

atha liṅagānapekṣaṃ dharmādharmādiṣu darśanamiṣṭaṃ tadapi yadi indriyārtha pādaparokṣamutpadyate pratyakṣameva । athendriyārthasannikarṣaṃ vinaiva dharma dutpadyate tathāpyārṣamityāha pratyakṣārṣaya ranyatarasminnantarbhūtamiti । buddhiārati * upasaṃhāraḥ paropagatāyā baddhevināśapara iti ।

§ sukhavaidharmyam

II,215,27 (VyV_II,215,27_II,216,6^1)

(“anugrahalakṣaṇaṃ sukham । nagādyabhipretaviṣayasānnidhye sati iṣṭopalabdhīndriyārthasannikarṣād dharmādyapekṣād ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogād anugrahā bhiṣvaṅganayanādiprasādajanakamutpadyate tat sukham । atīteṣu viṣayaṣu smṛtijam । anāgateṣu saṅkalpajam । yattu viduṣām asatsu viṣayānuḥ smaraṇecchāsaṅa kalpeṣvāvirbhavati tad vidyāśamasantoṣadharmaviśeṣanimitta miti ।”)

II,216,6 (VyV_II,216,6^2_II,216,21)

atha buddheranantaraṃ sukhasya kāryakāraṇasvarūpopadarśanārtham * anugrahalakṣaṇa sukham * ityādi । anugrahalakṣaṇamanugrahasvarūpam । yasminnutpanne sati ātmā anugṛhītamātmānaṃ manyata iti । * sragādyabhipretaviṣayasānnidhye sati * iti । sragādayaśca te abhipretaviṣayāśceti teṣāṃ sānnidhyam । anabhipratā rāgādayaḥ sukhahetavo na bhavantīti abhipretagrahaṇam । iṣṭopalabdhiśca indriyā rthasannikarṣaśceti tathoktaṃ tasmāt । dharmādyapekṣādityādipadena dikkālādena haṇam । tānyapekṣata iti tadapekṣastasmāt । iṣṭopalabdhīndriyārthasannikaṣād dharmādyapekṣād ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogāt asamavāyikāraṇād ātmani sukha mutpadyate । * anugrahābhiṣvaṅganayanādiprasādajanakam * iti kāryanirūpaṇam । anugṛhītiranugrahaḥ sukhaviṣayaṃ jñānam, āsattirabhiṣvaṅa gaḥ, nayanādiprasāda prasannatā । ādipadena mukhādiprasannatā gṛhyata iti । tadetat asādhāraṇatvā ditarasmād bhedakamiti jñeyam । na ca sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ svarūpato duḥkham, anugrahātmakasya sukhasyāpyanubhavāt । ataeva na duḥkhābhāve sukhavyavahāra iti vācyam । vibhinna kāraṇajanyasya tīvratarādibhedabhinnasya pratibhāsanāt । evaṃ duḥkhasyāpi na sukhābhāvarūpateti ।

II,216,21

yadetaduktaṃ sukhaṃ tat sannihite vastuni indriyārthasannikarṣādutpadyata, atītānāgateṣu smaraṇasaṅkalpābhyāmityāha atīteṣu * sukhasādhana * smṛtijam, anāgateṣu saṅkalpajam * ityetad heyamupadarśitam ।

II,216,24 (VyV_II,216,24_II,217,3)

* yattu viduṣāmasatsu 〈〉viṣayānusmaraṇecchāsaṅkalpeṣa * viṣayānus raṇañcecchā ca saṅkalpaśceti tathoktāḥ, teṣvavidyamāneṣvāvirbhavati tadupādaka meva । * vidyāśamasantoṣadharmaviśeṣanimittam * iti kāraṇopanyāsaḥ । vidyā tattvajñānaṃ tasmāt tattvajñānināṃ sukham । tathā śamo rāgādiāvināśaḥ, tasmācca śāntamanasāṃ sukham । santoṣo viṣayeṣvalampratyayaḥ, tasmācca sukham । keṣāścid dharmaviśeṣācceti ।

II,217,3

anye tu vidyayā janitaḥ saḥ śamaḥ, tasmāt sukhamiti । śeṣaṃ pūrvavat ।

§ duḥkhavaidharmyam

II,217,5 (VyV_II,217,5_II,217,9)

(“upaghātalakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham । viṣādyanabhipretaviṣayasānnidhye sati aniṣṭo dhāndriyārthasannikarṣāda adharmādyapekṣādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogāda yad mapighātadanyānimittamutpadyate, tad duḥkham । atīteṣu sarpavyāghracaurā diṣu smṛtijam । anāgateṣu saṅkalpajamiti ।”)

II,217,9

duḥkhanirūpaṇārthamāha * upaghātalakṣaṇam * upaghātasvarūpaṃ duḥkhamiti । tyata'neneti upahatamātmānaṃ manyata iti । kāraṇamāha 〈〉 * viṣādyanabhi viṣayasānnidhye sati | viṣādayaśca te 'nabhipretaviṣayāśceti, teṣāṃ navya satīti । abhipretāśca viṣayādayaḥ sūkhahetava evetyanabhipretagrahaṇama । jānnaṣṭopalabdhīndriyārthasannikarṣādadharmādyapekṣāta *7 aniṣṭopalabdhiśca apāyasannikarṣaśceti tathoktaḥ, tasmādadharmāpekṣādityādipadena dikkālāde 9m । tasmādaniṣṭopalabdhīndriyārthasannikarṣāda adharmādyapekṣādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogādasamavāyikāraṇāda ātmani samavetaṃ yad utpadyate tad daḥkham । paghātadanyānāṃ nimittaṃ kāraṇam, taditarasmād bhedakamiti jñeyam । laghu sādiṣviti kāryanirūpaṇam । amarṣo 'sahiṣṇutā, upahatirupaghāto lālambanaṃ jñānamiti । dainyaṃ dīnarūpatā daḥkhātpadyata iti । tadetada māraṇatvād itarasmāda bhedakamiti jñeyam । * atīteṣu sarpavyāghracaurā * duḥkhasādhaneṣu, * smṛtijam, anāgateṣu saṅkalpajamiti ।

§ icchāvaidharmyam

II,217,23 (VyV_II,217,23_II,218,5)

(“svārtha parārtha vā aprāptaprārthanecchā । sā cātmamanasoḥ saṃyogāta ukhādyapekṣāta smatyapekṣā vā utpadyate । prayatnasmṛtidharmādharmahetuḥ । kāmo 'bhilāṣaḥ, rāṇaḥ saṅkalpaḥ, kāruṇyam, vairāgyam, upadhā, bhāva ityeva mādaya icchābhedāḥ । maithunecchā kāmaḥ, abhyavahāracchā abhilāṣaḥ, punaḥ punarviṣayānurañjanecchā rāgaḥ, anāsannakriyecchā saṅkalpaḥ, svārthamanapekṣya paraduḥkhaprahāṇecchā kāruṇyam, doṣadarśanād viṣayatyāgecchā vairāgyam, paravañcanecchā upadhā, antarnigūḍhecchā bhāvaḥ । cikī jihīrṣetyādi kriyābhedād icchābhedā bhavanti ।”)

II,218,5

icchāyāḥ kāryakāraṇasvarūpanirūpaṇārthaṃ * svārthaṃ parārtha vā * ityādi । aprāpte vastuni prārthanārūpatvādiccheti । svārthaṃ parārthaṃ veti vipratipatti nirāsārthaṃ vibhāgakathanam, na kevalaṃ svārthameva parārthamapi । utpatti kāraṇamāha * sā cātmamanasoḥ saṃyogāt * asamavāyikāraṇādutpadyate । kimapekṣāt ? * sukhādyapekṣāt smṛtyapekṣād vā * iti । * prayatnasmṛti dharmādharmahetuḥ * iti kāryanirūpaṇam । śuddhābhisandhirdhamaheturduṣṭābhisandhi ścādharmaheturiti ।

II,218,12 (VyV_II,218,12)

anye 'pi guṇāḥ kāmādayaḥ santi ca śabde ? te ca kiṃ na sucitā iti codyasya parihārārthamantarbhāvaṃ nirūpayati * kāmo 'bhilāṣo rāgaḥ saṅkalpaḥ kāruṇyaṃ vairāgyam upadhā bhāva ityevamādaya icchābhedāḥ * tadviśeṣā iti । maithunecchā kāmaḥ, tatsadbhāve kāmīti vyapadeśāt, necchāmātramiti । abhyava haraṇecchā abhilāṣaḥ, abhilāṣalakṣaṇecchā । sāmānyena sarvasmin vastuni abhyavaharaṇamādānaṃ vivakṣitam । tadicchā abhilāṣa iti cānye । * punaḥ punarviṣayānurañjanecchā rāgaḥ * tena hi satā rāgīti vyapadeśāt । anāsanna kriyāyām anāgatakriyāyāmicchā saṅkalpaḥ । * svārthamanapekṣya paraduḥkhaprahā ṇecchā * tadvināśecchā kāruṇyam । doṣadarśanād viṣayeṣu parityāgecchā vairāgyam । tat sadbhāve viraktavyavahārāt । * paravañcanecchā upadhā । antarnigūḍhecchā bhāvaḥ * iti । yadyapi icchā sarvā antarna bāhyeti; tathāpi iyamanyāpekṣayā kathañcid vijñāyata ityantanigūḍhetyucyate । * cikīrṣā jihīretyādikriyābhedādicchābhedā bhavanti * kartumicchā cikīrṣā, hartumicchā jihīrṣeti ।

§ dveṣavaidharmyam

II,218,27 (VyV_II,218,27_II,219,4)

(“prajvalanātmako dveṣaḥ । yasmin sati prajvalitamivātmānaṃ manyate, sa dveṣaḥ । sa cātmamanasoḥ saṃyogād duḥkhāpekṣāt smṛtyapekṣād votpadyate । prayatnasmṛtidharmādharmahetuḥ । drohaḥ, krodhaḥ, manyurakṣamā amarṣa iti dveṣabhedāḥ ।”)

II,219,4

dveṣanirūpaṇārthamāha 〈〉* prajvalanātmakaḥ prajvalanasvarūpo dveṣaḥ । * yasmin sati prajvalitamivātmānaṃ manyate, sa dveṣaḥ । iti pūrvasya vivaraṇam । * sa cātmanasoḥ saṃyogāt । asamavāyikāraṇāt, * duḥkhāpekṣāt smṛtyapekṣād vā * ātmanyutpadyata iti । * prayatnasmṛtidharmādharmahetuḥ * iti kāryanirūpaṇam । yathā hi dveṣād vadhādau pravartamānasyādharmo bhavatyevaṃ yajanādau pravartamānasya dharmo 'pīti । bhedanirūpaṇārthamāha *drohaḥ krodho manyurakṣamā amarṣa iti dveṣabhedāḥ * tadviśeṣā iti । svāmino 'pakāro drohaḥ, krodhastu yasminnutpanne śarīrendriyāvayavānāṃ vikāraḥ sampadyate । manyurapakṛtasyāpa kartumasamarthasya kaṇṭhākṣavikārajanakaḥ । akṣamā asahiṣṇutā । amarṣo 'pa karturvarṣādivyavadhānenāpya〈〉pa karaṇam ।

II,219,14 (VyV_II,219,14_II,219,20^1)

nanvete sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣāḥ kathaṃ vijñānād vyatiricyante, samānakāraṇa janyatvād antarmukhākāratayā pratīyamānatvācceti kāraṇabhedena hi padārthā bhidyanta ityuktam । 〈 taduktam 〉 tadatadrūpiṇo bhāvāstadatadrūpahetujāḥ / tatsukhādi kimajñānaṃ vijñānābhinnahetujam // <= pra. vā. 2.251> iti ।

II,219,20 (VyV_II,219,20^2)

tathā hi, kecid bhāvastadrūpiṇo dhānyādirūpiṇaḥ, anye 'tadrūpiṇastad vidharmāṇa iti । kasmāt ? tadatadrūpahetujatvāt । dhānyarūpāt kāraṇādutpannā stadrūpiṇaḥ, anye tu vilakṣaṇā atadrūpiṇaḥ, ityukte satyāha yadyevaṃ tatsukhādi vijñānenābhinnahetujaṃ kimajñānamiṣṭam ? naitadevam, abhede sādhye samavāyya samavāyinimittāpekṣayāpi samānakāraṇajanyatvasya vyabhicārāt । tathā hi, ekasmāt samavāyikāraṇādutpadyante pākajāḥ parasparaṃ vibhinnāśceti । asamavāyikāraṇantu pārthivaparamāṇvagnisaṃyogasteṣāmeka eva । tathā eko 'pyuṣṇasparśasteṣāṃ nimittakāraṇamiti, tadapekṣayāpi vyabhicāraḥ । sāmagracapekṣayā tvasiddhaṃ samānakāraṇajanyatvam, tasyāḥ pratikāryaniyatatvāt । uktañca ekatra sragādyapalakṣitā sāmagrī kāraṇam, anyatrānyathābhateti । tathā pratiniyatajātaḥ prāgabhāvasya cānupraveśe sarvatra sāmagrībhedo bhavatyeveti । antarmukhākāratayā pratīyamānatvañca jñānadharmarvyabhicārīti । asti ca dharmadharmiṇorbheda ityuktam । tathā jñānasyānutpattivināśābhyāṃ vyabhicāraḥ, tayorantarmukhākāratayā pratāya mānatvam, na ca bodharūpatetyalamatiprasaṅgena ।

§ prayatnavaidharmyam

II,220,8 (VyV_II,220,8_II,220,14)

(“prayatnaḥ saṃrambha utsāha iti paryāyāḥ । sa dvividho jīvanapūrvaka, icchādveṣapūrvakaśca । tatra jīvanapūrvakaḥ suptasya prāṇāpānasantānaprakā, prabodhakāle ca antaḥkaraṇasyendriyāntaraprāptihetuḥ । asya jīvanapūrva kasya ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogād dharmādharmāpekṣādutpattiḥ । itarastu hitāhita prāptiparihārasamarthasya vyāpārasya hetaḥ, śarīravidhārakaśca । saca ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogād icchāpekṣād dveṣāpekṣād botpadyate ।”)

II,220,14

atha prayatnasya kāraṇasvarūpavibhāganirūpaṇārthamāha * prayatnaḥ saramma utsāha iti paryāyāḥ * lakṣaṇam, asādhāraṇatvāt । tathā hi, prayatna itara smād bhidyate, anādikālapravāhāyātetthambhūtaparyāyābhidheyatvāt, yastu । bhidyate, na cāsāvevam, yathā rūpādiriti । sa dvividhaḥ kāraṇabhedādityāha * jīvanapūrvaka icchādveṣapūrvakaśca jīvanaṃ pūrva kāraṇamasyeti jīvanapūrvakaḥ । sa kathaṃ vijñāyata ityāha * suptasya prāṇāpānasantānaprerakaḥ * iti । 55 suptasya prāṇāpānasantānakriyā, sā prayatnakāryā śarīra〈〉 kriyātvāt, jāpa vasthāyāṃ prāṇakriyādivaditi । na paraṃ prāṇādisantānaprerakaḥ * prabāyakā. cāntaḥkaraṇasyendriyāntareṇa prāptihetuḥ * iti । yathā hi prabāyata yenaivendriyeṇopalambhastenaiva sambandhārthamantaḥkaraṇasya nirindriyātmā vartamānasyāvaśyaṃ karmābhyupeyam, tacca prayatnakārya parigṛhītāntara karmatvāt, jāgradavasthāyāṃ tatkarmavat । ata eva nādṛṣṭasyaivātra kāraṇa anamānena prayatnakāryatvopalabdheḥ । kāraṇāntarāsambhave cādṛṣṭasyavānā kāraṇatvamiṣyata iti ।

II,221,1 (VyV_II,221,1)

sthite hi sadbhāve jīvanapūrvakasyotpattikāraṇamāha * ātmamanasoḥ pāgāt * asamavāyikāraṇāda viśiṣṭadharmādharmāpekṣādatpattiriti । itarastu raṇadvaṣapūrvakaḥ * hitāhitaprāptiparihārasamarthasya vyāpārasya * kāyikavyāpārasya hetuḥ । tathā * śarīravidhārakaśca * । tena hi pratibaddhaṃ śarīre gurutvaṃ na patanamārabhate । tasyotpattikāraṇamāha * ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogāta * asamavāyi kāraṇāt । * icchāpekṣāda dveṣāpekṣād votpadyate * iti ।

§ gurutvavaidharmyam

II,221,8 (VyV_II,221,8_II,221,11)

(“gurutva jalabhūmyoḥ patanakarmakāraṇam । apratyakṣam, patanakarmānumeyam, palasaskāravirodhi । asya ca abādiparamāṇurūpādivannityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ ।”)

II,221,11

gurutvasya lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthaṃ garutvaṃ jalabhūmyoḥ' ityādi prakaraṇama । pratyakṣatve sati patanakarmakāraṇatvād gurutvam itarasmād miyata । padāpekṣaṃ vā lakṣaṇam । jā gurutvam । raso 'pi jalabhūna 〈〉vā?ca kāraṇātiśayana bhāvena pātātiśayābhā nāstīti na rasaḥ kāraṇa patanakarmakāraṇamityapratyakṣagrahaṇam । jalabhūmyoti āśrayānarū vā lakṣaṇam । jalabhūmyoreva vartamānatve sati patanakarmakāraṇatvāda । raso 'pi jalabhūmyoreva vartate, na tu patanakāraṇam, abhyupagame 'kāraṇātiśayena kāryātiśayasya anyatropalabdhaḥ pāṣāṇāde rasātiśayā tātiśayābhāvaḥ. pippalyādau ca tatsadbhāvena sadabhāvaḥ syāta । sa śati na rasaḥ kāraṇaṃ patanotpattau । rūpādeśca kāraṇatve analādāvapi pat pātaḥ syāt, na cāstītyato rūpādivyatiriktaṃ kāraṇamanumīyata maha* patanakarmānameyama iti । ādyasya hi patanakarmaṇo 'samavāyi " gurutvam, dvitīyādestu saṃskāro 'pīti । sa cāsau jalabhūmyoreva kāraṇaṃ gurutvam, dvitīyādava vartate । pratyakṣatāprasaṅgāt । atha ca tat pṛthivyādigurutvaḥ

II,221,22 (VyV_II,221,22)

nanu tvagindriyasya vyāpārāta pañcapalaṃ daśapalamiti pratibhāsanād - satyakṣam ? na. tvagindriyeṇa sambandhopapatteḥ pṛthivyādigarutvasyāpi pratyakṣatāprasaṅgāt । atha ādheyagatameva gurutvaṃ paricchinatti tvagindriyam, na cavyādigurutve 'stīti । nanvevamapi makṣikādigurutvaṃ paricchindyāt, tasyāpyādheyagatatvāditi । na ca tasya aviśiṣṭatvādaparicchedaḥ, pratyakṣadravyasa mavāyasyāviśeṣāt । atha adhogatihetutvaṃ vaiśiṣṭayam ? tarhi tvagindriyasamba ndhena adhogativiśeṣamupalabhamānasya pañcapalaṃ daśapalamityānumānika eva pratyayaḥ ।

II,222,5 (VyV_II,222,5)

atha daśapalaistantubhirārabdhe paṭe gurutvātiśayasyānupalabdheḥ, kāraṇa eva gurutvam, na tu kārye । tadasat, ubhayatrāpi pātopalabdheḥ । na ca svagatagurutvā bhāve 'pi āśrayāntaragurutvādeva patanam, vāyvāderapi pātaprasaṅgāt । tasmāduḥ bhayatrāpi kāryeṇa sadbhāvasiddhergurutvamastīti । avanativiśeṣānupalambhaśca kārye makṣikādigurutvasamparkeṇāpi samāna iti । tathā hi, tantuṣu mīyamāna makṣikādisamparke 'pi avanativiśeṣā nopalabhyante, na ca tadgurutvasyāsattva mityalam ।

II,222,12 (VyV_II,222,12)

atha gurutvasya pātahetutve kimiti sarvadā pāto na bhavati ? pratibandhā dityāha * saṃyogaprayatnasaṃskāravirodhi * iti । vṛntaphalasaṃyogena pratibaddha na phale patanamārabhate, prayatnapratibandhād ākāśāvasthiteṣu śakuniṣu gurutvaṃ na patanaṃ karoti, dhanunikṣipteṣu śareṣu gurutvaṃ na patanaṃ karoti vegākhyasaṃskā pratibandhāt, eṣāmapāye phalādiṣu pātadarśanāt ।

II,222,17 (VyV_II,222,17)

* tasya cābādiparamāṇurūpādivannityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ iti । abādayaśca te paramāṇavaśceti tathoktāḥ, tatparamāṇurūpādīnāmiveti । yathā āpyaparamāṇurūpādīnāmaniṣpadyamānatvānnityatvam, evameva gurutvaṃ nityeṣvāna ṣpattainityam, anitye tu kāraṇaguṇapūrvaprakrameṇa niṣpadyamānatvāt tadrūpavadevāni tyamityatideśārthaḥ ।

§ dravatvavaidharmyam

II,222,23 (VyV_II,222,23_II,223,10)

(“dravatvaṃ spandanakarmakāraṇam । tridravyavṛtti । tatta dvividham, sāsira ddhikam, laimittikañca । sāṃsiddhikabhapāṃ viśeṣaguṇaḥ । naimittikaṃ pṛthivā tejasoḥ sāmānyaguṇaḥ । sāṃsiddhikasya gurutvavannityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ ।”)

II,222,26

(“saṅghātadarśanāt sāṃsiddhikatvamayuktamiti cet, na, divyatejaḥsaṃyuktānāmāpyānāṃ paramāṇanāṃ parasparaṃ saṃyogo dravyārambhakaḥ saṅghātākhyaḥ, sana paramāṇudravatvastha pratibandhāt kārye himakarakādau dravatvānutpattiḥ ।”)

II,223,3

(“namittikañca pathivītejasoragnisaṃyogajam । katham ? sapirjatu pūcchiṣṭādīnāṃ kāraṇeṣu paramāṇaṣvagnisaṃyogād vegāpekṣāt karmotpattī rājabhyo vibhāgebhyo dravyārambhakasaṃyogavināśāt kāryadravyanivṛttāvagni yāgād auṣṇyāpekṣāta svatantreṣa paramāṇaṣa dravatvamūtpadyate । tatasteṣa nāganāmadaṣṭāpekṣāda ātmāṇasaṃyogāta karmotpattau tajjebhyaḥ saṃyogebhyo vaṣaṇukādiprakrameṇa kāryadravyamutpadyate, tasmiṃśca rūpāyutpattisamakālaṃ kāraṇaguṇaprakrameṇa dravatvamutpadyata iti ।”)

II,223,10

dravatvasya lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthamāha*dravatvaṃ syandanakarmakāraṇam iti । syandana - vakṣyamāṇam । tatkāraṇaṃ dravatvamityukte vegena vyabhicāraḥ, tadarthaṃ tridravya ta । tathāpi nidravyavattitvaṃ vegasyāpi sambhavatīti niyameneti padamūhyam । rūpantu niyamena tridravyavṛtti, na tu syandanakamakāraṇam । sarasmā dbhidyate, niyamena tridravyavṛttitve sati syandanakarmakāraṇatvāditi ।

II,223,15 (VyV_II,223,15)

tattu dvividhamiti vibhāgaḥ । kena rūpeṇa ? sāṃsiddhikaṃ naimittika pati । tayoḥ parasparaṃ vailakṣaṇyanirūpaṇārthamāha * sāṃsiddhikamapāṃ viśeṣaguṇaḥ, naimittika pṛthivītejasoḥ sāmānyaguṇaḥ * iti parasparabhedaḥ । * sāṃsiddhi "tya gurutvavannityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ iti । yathā gurutvaṃ nityeṣvaniṣpadya mānatvānnityama anityeṣa niṣpatteranityaṃ kāraṇaguṇapūrvakamāśrayavināśācca vinaśyati, evaṃ sāṃsiddhikadravatvamapītyatideśārthaḥ ।

II,223,21 (VyV_II,223,21)

nanu cāyuktametad apāṃ sāṃsiddhikadravyatvamiti, himakarakādāvanupa bhāt ? * tadāha saṅghātadarśanāt sāṃsiddhikatvamayuktamiti cet, * naitadevam । patra salile sāṃsiddhikadravatvasyopalabdheḥ, āpyaparamāṇuṣu tatsadbhāvasiddhau himakarakādo tasyānatpādāta pratibandhakamastīti niścīyate । tacca anyasyāna palambhād divyatejaḥsaṃyoga evetyāha - divyatejaḥsaṃyuktānāmāpyānāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ raspara saṃyogo dravyārambhakaḥ * । sa ca * saṅghātākhyaḥ, tena paramāṇudravatvasya tibandhāt kārye himakarakādau dravatvānutpattiḥ * iti । tejaḥsadbhāvastu sphoṭādikāryānumeyaḥ । tathā ca himakarakāsambandhādupalabhyate sphoṭādilakṣaṇaṃ kārya śarīre vṛkṣādau ca dāha iti । vilayanañcāsya divyatejaḥsambandhāt । avayave kriyā, tato vibhāgastasmāt saṃyoganivṛttau dravyavināśe sati paramāṇavaḥ kāryamārabhante । tatra ca divyatejaḥsaṃyogasya pratibandhakasya nivṛtteḥ paramāṇudravatvaṃ kārye dravatvamārabhate ।

II,224,6 (VyV_II,224,6_II,224,9^1)

na cedaṃ naimittikam, sarpirādāviva punaḥ saṃgrahānupalabdheḥ । yathāhi naimittikadravatvaṃ sarpirādāviti drutasya saṃgrahaḥ, tathehā'pi syāt । na caitadastīti ।

II,224,9 (VyV_II,224,9^2)

* naimittikañca pṛthivītejasoragnisaṃyogajam * । kathamityavyutpannapraśnaḥ । tatrāha sarpirādīnāṃ kāraṇeṣvityādipadena sūtroktānāṃ saṃgrahaḥ । tathā hi sapirjatumadhūcchiṣṭānāṃ pārthivānāmagnisaṃyogād dravatvamadbhiḥ sāmānyam । trapusosaloharajatasuvarṇānāṃ taijasānāmagnisaṃyogādravatvamadbhiḥ sāmānyamiti । ataḥ sapirādikāraṇeṣu ca paramāṇuṣvagnisaṃyogā pekṣā vegāpekṣāt karmotpattau satyantato vibhāgā jāyante । tebhyo vibhāgebhyoṃ dravyārambhakasaṃyogavināśaḥ, tataḥ kāryadravyanivṛttistasyāñca satyāmagni saṃyogād auṣṇyāpekṣāt svatantreṣu paramāṇuṣu dravatvamutpadyate । paramāṇavaḥ sabhavāyikāraṇam, agnisaṃyogo 'samavāyikāraṇamuṣṇasparśī nimittakāraṇa miti । tato 'nantaramutpannadravatveṣu * bhogināmadṛṣṭāpekṣādātmāṇusaṃyogāt * karmotpadyata iti । paramāṇuḥ samavāyikāraṇam, ātmāṇusaṃyogo 'samavāya kāraṇam, bhogināmadṛṣṭo nimittakāraṇamiti । tato vibhāgebhyaḥ prāktana saṃyogavināśe sati tebhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ paramāṇvantareṇa saṃyogā jāyante । tebhyaḥ saṃyogebhyo dvacaṇukāṇyutpadyante । tadādikrameṇa dvyaṇukādikāryamutpadyata । tasmiṃśca dvyaṇukādau * rūpādyutpattisamakālaṃ kāraṇaguṇapūrvakrameṇa dravatvamutpadyara iti * pākajotpattinyāyo 'tra draṣṭavyaḥ । etāvāṃstuviśeṣaḥ, tatrāvaśyaṃ rūpāvi nivṛttirna caivaṃ dravatvasyeti ।

§ snehavaidharmyam

II,224,27 (VyV_II,224,27_II,225,4)

(“sneho 'pāṃ viśeṣaguṇaḥ । saṃgrahamṛjādihetaḥ । asyāpi guruvāra nityānityatvaniṣpattayaḥ ।”)

II,225,1

snehasya lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthaṃ * sneho 'pāṃ viśeṣaguṇaḥ saṅgrahamajādihetuḥ * śata । apāṃ viśeṣaguṇo rūpādirapīti saṅgrahamṛjādiheturiti padam । saṅgrahaḥ piṇḍīkaraṇam । mṛjā tu viśadatvam । taddhatutvāditarasmād bhidyate ।

II,225,4

nanu snehasyābhinavapallavādāvupalambhād udakaviśeṣaguṇatvamasiddham ? , sayuktasamavāyenopalambhāt । saṃyukta hi pallavādinā udakaṃ tatsamaveta nahā gṛhyate, tadapāye tasyānupalabdheḥ, tathā snānottarakālaṃ keśādau 'nagdhapratyayadarśanāt । yathā ca saṃyogyāśrayavaiguṇyābhāve sarvasminnudake snigdha sāna nave sarvasyāṃ pṛthivyāmiti । asyāpi gurutvavannityānityatvaniṣpattaya sasa । nityeṣu nityo 'nityeṣu kāraṇaguṇapūrvaḥ, āśrayavināśād vinaśyatīti ।

§ saṃskāravaidharmyam

II,225,11 (VyV_II,225,11_II,225,15)

(“sarakārastrividho go bhāvanā sthitisthāpakaśca । tatra " sūtimattu pañcasu dravye nivittaviśeṣāpekṣāta karmaṇo jāyate, pādikaliyāprabandhahetuḥ sparśavadāvyasaṃyogaviśeṣavirodhī kvacita kāraṇaguṇapūrvakrameṇotpadyate ।”)

II,225,15

saskāranirūpaṇārthamāha * saṃskārastrividhaḥ * । kena rūpeṇa ? vego bhāvanā tasthāpakatveneti । vibhāga evāsādhāraṇatvāllakṣaṇamiti, tallakṣaṇa citryajñāpanārthametat । tatra vegasya samānajātīyāt bhedamāśrayañca nirūpa nāha* mūrtimatsū * ityādi । mūrtimatsu dravyeṣu । na jñāyate kiyatsu, tadarthaṃ * pañcasu * । tathāpi na jñāyate keṣu, tadarthaṃ * mūrtimatsu * ityāśrayanirūpaṇam । "1 vā saṃskāratve sati pañcasu mūrtimatsveva vartamānatvād vega iti lakṣaṇam ।

II,225,21 (VyV_II,225,21)

kāraṇamāha nimittaviśeṣāpekṣāt karmaṇo jāyate iti । saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ tvamiti nimittaviśeṣāpekṣāditi viśeṣaṇam । nimittaviśeṣo nodanā atisaṃyuktasaṃyogāḥ, tadapekṣāditi । karma asamavāyikāraṇam, svakāraṇa sapā nodanādinimittakāraṇam, vegādhārastū samavāyikāraṇamitya raṇatvāllakṣaṇaṃ cedama । kāryasāha niyatāyāṃ diśi kriyāprabandhasya kriyāsantānasya heturiti ।

II,225,27 (VyV_II,225,27)

nanu cāyuktametat, aniyatadigadeśasya bhramaṇākhyasyāpi karmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvāt, satyametat, tathāpyadoṣaḥ, niyatadikriyāprabandhasyaiva heturityavadhāra ṇānabhyupagamāt । so 'pi niyatāyāmeva diśi kriyāprabandha iti cānye । ani yatadikriyāprabandhaheturityavadhāraṇasyātra pūrvarūpatāṃ manyamānā vyākhyāntara kurvate । tasya vināśakāraṇamāha * sparśavadravyasaṃyogaviśeṣavirodhī * iti । sparśavadravyasaṃyogamātravirodhitve vāyusaṃyogena virodhādiṣorgamanaṃ na syāt, taddhetoāgasya vināśāditi viśeṣagrahaṇam, kaṭhināvayavasaṃyogenādāvāpa tadvināśopalabdheḥ ।

II,226,8 (VyV_II,226,8)

nanvevamapyākāśe prakṣiptasyeṣonibiḍāvayavasaṃyogasya vegavināśakasyā bhāvādapātaḥ syāt, na, anekakāryakaraṇe sparśavadravyasaṃyogamātreṇāpi vinā śasyānvayavyatirekābhyāmupalambhāt । tathā ca kṣiptasyeṣorvegavināśopalabdha ravaśyaṃ kāraṇamabhidheyam, nirhetukavināśapratiṣedhāt । ato vāyusaṃyogenāpyaneka kāryakaraṇe sati virudhyate, adṛṣṭaprakṣayād veti । * kvacit kāraṇaguṇapūva prakrameṇotpadyate * yathā parvatasrotasāmadhaḥpatatāṃ saṃyoge satyekasminnudaka samutpanne rūpādivat kāraṇavegād bego 'pīti ।

II,226,15 (VyV_II,226,15_II,226,24)

(“bhāvanāsajñakastvātmaguṇo dṛṣṭaśrutānubhūteṣvartheṣu smṛtipratyābha jñānaheturbhavati, jñānamadaduḥkhādivirodhī । paṭvabhyāsādarapratyayajaḥ paṭṭa pratyayāpekṣādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogād āścarye 'rthe paṭaḥ saṃskārātiśayā jāyate । yathā dākṣiṇātyasyoṣṭradarśanāditi । vidyāśilpavyāyāmādi pvabhyasyamāneṣu tasminnevārthe pūrvapūrvasaṃskāramapekṣamāṇāduttarottarasmāra pratyayādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogāt saṃskārātiśayo jāyate । prayatnena manāna kṣuṣi sthāpayitvā aparvamartha didakṣamāṇasya vidyatasampātadarśanavadāra pratyayaḥ, tamapekṣamāṇādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogāta saṃskārātiśayo jāyate । yathā devahūde sauvarṇarājatapadmadarśanāditi ।”)

II,226,24

bhāvanāsaṃjñakastvātmaguṇatvāditarasmād bhidyate । na ca buddhayādiā' bhicāraḥ, saṃskārasya sato 'vāntaraviśeṣanirūpaṇāt । * smṛtipratyabhijñānahara iti kāryanirūpaṇam, sadbhāve pramāṇañceti । “smṛtirvāsanākhyāt” bhavati, tathāktamātmādhikāre । keṣu smṛtipratyabhijñānaheturityāha * dṛṣṭa śrutānubhūteṣu । iti, nirṇītārtheṣviti bhāvaḥ ।

II,227,3 (VyV_II,227,3)

nāśakāraṇamāha * jñānamadadaḥkhādivirodhī * iti । jñānaṃ pratipakṣajñānaṃ vivakṣitam, tena virudhyate, yathā ātmādijñānajanitaḥ saṃskāro nairātmyā camyāseneti, tasmin sati tatrāsmaraṇāt । svamadena virodhaḥ, bālāvasthānubhavajanitasaṃskārasya punaryavāvasthāyāṃ viṣayābhibhūtasya tatrāsmaraṇāt । utkhana, yathā śāstrānubhavajanitasaṃskārasya tīvraṇa dārādiduḥkheneti, tena satā tatrāsmaraṇāt । ādipadena tu krodhāderapi saṃskāranivartakatvamuktam ।

II,227,9 (VyV_II,227,9^1) (VyV_II,227,9^2)

tasyotpattikāraṇamāha paṭavabhyāsādarapratyayebhyo jātastatpratyayaja ta । paṭupratyayāpekṣādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogādasamavāyikāraṇādātmanyāścarye 'rthe " saṃskāro jāyate, * yathā dākṣiṇātyasyoṣṭradarśanāt । sa cātiśayena smṛtiheturbhavatīti । (abhyāsād) * vidyāśilpavyāyāmādiṣvabhya mānaṣu tasminnevārthe pūrvapūrvasaṃskāramapekṣamāṇādattarottarasmāt pratyayā manasoḥ saṃyogāt saṃskārātiśayo jāyate । pūrvapūrvasaṃskārāpekṣo hi sarāttarapratyayo 'bhyāsaḥ, tamapekṣamāṇādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogādasamavāyikāraṇā "māna saskārātiśayo jāyate * । tatra vidyāyāma upādhyāyoccaritapadaśravaṇe ka saṃskāraḥ । pūnarvivakṣādikrameṇa svayamuccāraṇe sati tu jñānaṃ pūrva skārāpekṣaṃ saṃskārāntaramārabhate । punastaduccāraṇe sati tajjñānaṃ pūrvasaṃskā pakṣa saṃskārāntaramārabhata ityevaṃ tricaturādiparivartane satyantyapadānubhavāt saskārāpekṣāta saṃskārātiśayo jāyate । etaccāvaśyamabhyupeyam, anyathā savayathya syāt । na cātiprasaṅgaḥ, adṛṣṭasya vyavasthāhetutvāt । na ca bhāsta sarvatra sadabhāvaḥ, kāryasya smaraṇasya sarvatrānupalabdheḥ । yatra hi ṇamāsta tatraiva pūrvasaṃskārāpekṣaṃ jñānaṃ saṃskāramārabhata iti । āntare pāsa pūrvapūrvasaṃskārāpekṣaṃ niyatārthasmaraṇameva saṃskāramārabhata iti yam । evaṃ śilpe 'pyapādhyāyalikhitacitradarśanāta saṃskāraḥ, punaḥ svayaṃ pādhopalabhate; tadanubhavaḥ pūrvasaṃskārāpekṣaḥ saṃskārāntaramārabhate, punaḥ svayaṃ khatvopalabhate, tadanabhavaḥ pūrvasaṃskārāpekṣaḥ saṃskārāntaramārabhate, ityevaṃ dvinyādiparivartanena saṃskārātiśayaḥ । vyāyāme 'pi upādhyāyena dhanurvedapari paṭhitanyāyena prayukteṣūpalambhādupajāte saṃskāre punastadanusāritayā svayaṃ prayukta tadanubhavena pūrvasaṃskārāpekṣeṇa saṃskārāntaramārabhyate, punastathaiva prayoge sati tadanubhavena pūrvasaṃskārāpekṣeṇānyaḥ saṃskāra ityevamantyānubhavāt saṃskārātiśaya iti ।

II,228,6 (VyV_II,228,6)

ādarapratyayajasaṃskāramāha * prayatlena manaḥ cakṣuṣi sthāpayitvā apūrvamartha didṛkṣamāṇasya - iti, draṣṭumicchato vidyutsampātadarśanena tulyaṃ vartate, iti tadarśanavadādarapratyayaḥ । tamapekṣamāṇādātmamanasoḥ saṃyogādasamavāyikāraṇā dātmani saṃskārātiśayo jāyate । * yathā devahrade sauvarṇarājatapadmadarśanā * - diti । tatra hi sauvarṇarājatapatrayorutthānamāgamāllokapravādato vā samupalabhya punaviśiṣṭayātrāsamaye prayatnena saṃskārātiśayo bhavatīti ।

II,228,12 (VyV_II,228,12_II,228,17)

(“sthitisthāpakastu sparśavadravyeṣu vartamāno dhanāvayavatanniveśa viśiṣṭeṣu kālāntarāvasthāyidhu svābhayamandhākṛtaṃ yathāvat sthāpayati । sthāvarajaṅgamavikāreṣu dhanuḥśākhādantaśṛṅgāsthisūtravastrādiṣu bhugnasaṃtiteṣu sthitisthāpakasya kārya saṃlakṣyate । nityānityatvaniṣpa ttayo 'syāpi gurutvavat draṣṭavyā ।”)

II,228,17

sthitisthāpakastu saṃskāratve sati sparśavatsveva dravyeṣu vartamānatvā ditarasmāda bhidyate । kiṃ bhūteṣu ? * dhanāvayavasanniveśaviśiṣṭaṣu 5 iti । ghanāśca te avayavāśca, teṣāṃ sanniveśo racanāviśeṣaḥ । ghana iti sanniveśasya vā viśeṣaṇam, tadviśiṣṭeṣu । * kālāntarāvasthāyiṣu svāśrayamanyathākṛtaṃ yathāvat sthāpayati * ityataḥ sthitisthāpakaḥ ।

II,228,22 (VyV_II,228,22_II,229,4)

sadbhāve pramāṇamāha sthāvarāśca jaṅgamāśceti tathoktāsteṣāṃ vikāreṣu dhanuḥśākhādantaśṛṅgāsthiṣu, sūtravastrādiṣu ca bhagneṣu saṃvartiteṣu piṇḍī kṛteṣu tasya kārya saṃlakṣyate । tathā hi dhanuṣi śākhādī ca ākarṣaṇakarmaṇyupa jāte nodanādibhyastannivṛttāvapi karmopalambhādavaśyamasamavāyikāraṇaṃ vācyam, vastunastadantareṇānutpatteḥ । na ca nodanāderanyatamaḥ sambhāvyata ityanyenāsama vāyikāraṇena bhavitavyam, kriyāvibhāgayośca kriyotpattāvakāraṇatvopalambhāt । tathā tannivṛttāvapi pratibandhakābhāve sati śākhādau pūrvāvasthāvasthāpakakarmopa lambhānimittāntarameva nyāyyam । adṛṣṭa viśeṣasya tu sādhāraṇatvāt kāraṇatvaṃ na pratiṣiddhayata iti ।

II,229,4

* nityānityatvaniṣpattayo 'pyasya gurutvavad draṣṭavyā * iti । yathā hi garutvaṃ nityeṣu nityamutpattivināśakāraṇābhāvādanityeṣu kāraṇapūrvakamāśraya vināśād vinaśyati evaṃ sthitisthāpakasaṃskāro 'pīti । kārye tu sthiti sthāpakasaṃskāraprasiddhestadārambhakaparamāṇuṣvapi tatkalpanā kriyate ।

§ dharmavaidharmyam

II,229,9 (VyV_II,229,9_II,229,14)

(“dharmaḥ puruṣaguṇaḥ, kartuḥ priyahitamokṣahetuḥ, atīndriyo 'ntya sukhasaṃvijñānavirodhī, puruṣāntaḥkaraṇasaṃyogaviśuddhābhisandhijaḥ, varṇā śramiṇāṃ pratiniyatasādhananimittaḥ । tasya tu sādhanāni śrutismṛti vihitāni varṇāśramiṇāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvenāvasthitāni dravyaguṇa karmāṇi ।”)

II,229,14

dharmasya lakṣaṇaparokṣārthamāha * dharmaḥ puruṣaguṇaḥ * ityādi । puruṣaguṇatvaṃ buddhayādāvapītyataḥ * priyahitamokṣahetuḥ * iti । priyaṃ sukham, hitaṃ tatsādhanam । navānāmātmaviśeṣaguṇānāmatyantocchittirmokṣa iti । atheśvarajñānamapyeṣāṃ heturataḥ karturiti । yena hi kṛto dharmastatraiva priyahitamokṣahetuḥ, na caivamīśvarajñānasya, akāryatayā karturabhāvāditi । atha tattvajñānaṃ karturyathoktaphalahetustadarthamatīndriya iti । saṃskāro 'pi smṛtidvāreṇaiva bhavatītyato 'ntyasukhasaṃvijñānavirodhīti । antyamāvasānikaṃ sukhaṃ tatsaṃvedanena virudhyate ।

II,229,22 (VyV_II,229,22_II,229,26)

nanvevamapi atīndriyatve satyantyasukhasaṃvijñānavirodhitvāt, dharmaḥ itarasmād bhidyata ityukte vyabhicārābhāvād vyarthaṃ śeṣābhidhānam, na, anya svāt kartuḥ । priyahitamokṣaheturiti viśiṣṭārthakriyānirūpaṇam । puruṣaguṇa ityanyathābhāvapratiṣedhārtham ।

II,229,26

atha puruṣaguṇatve kiṃ pramāṇam ? anumānamāgamaśca । tathā hi tanu bhuvanādikāryam, puruṣaguṇapūrvakam, vicitrakāryatvād, rathādivaditi । yathāhi rathādikartā bhokturabhiprāyaṃ vicitramapekṣamāṇastathaiva tadracanāṃ karoti evaṃ śarīrādikāpīti । na ca śarīrotpatteḥ pūrvamasmadādyātmani buddhayādayaḥ santi, saṃskārastu smaraṇotpattāvevāvagatasāmarthya iti guṇāntaraṃ tadgatama pakṣamāṇastadupabhoganiṣpattaye vicitraṃ śarīrādikamārabhata iti । āgamastu 'yāvadātmani dharmādharmoṃ tāvadāyuḥ śarīramindriyāṇi viṣayāśceti, tathā 'kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇī'ti ।

II,230,7 (VyV_II,230,7)

yeṣāntu buddhiguṇo dharmasteṣāṃ kathaṃ nākarmanimittaḥ svargaḥ ? tathā hi pralayāvasthāyāṃ buddheḥ pradhāne pralīnatayā dharmādharmayoranabhivyaktī pradhānasya buddhadhādibhāvena pariṇāmo na syāt, abhivyaktasya karmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvābhyupa gamāt । na cādāvanabhivyaktameva kāraṇam, buddhisthañcābhivyaktamiti vācyam, viśeṣahetvabhāvāt । buddhayādisampāditaṃ karma karturbhogasampādakamityabhyupagame ca aviśeṣeṇa sakalapuruṣopabhogasampādakaṃ syāt, niyamahetvabhāvāt । tathā muktātmano 'pi śarīrādisampādanāya pravarteta, aviśeṣāditi saṃsāritvaprasaṅgaḥ । guṇapuruṣāntaravivekādarśanañca pradhānapravṛtterna kāraṇam, pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt ।

II,230,15 (VyV_II,230,15_II,230,21)

ye 'pi paramāṇurūpo dharma iti manyante, teṣāmapi tasya nityatāyāṃ sakalakriyāvilopaprasaṅgaḥ, maraṇādyabhāvaśca । anityatā tu paramāṇurūpatāyāṃ na sambhavatyeva, tasya paramāṇutvenotpattivināśakāraṇābhāvāt । tathā paramāṇūnāṃ dharmaśabdenābhidhāne saṃjñābhedamātrameva syāt । atha paramāṇuguṇau dharmādhau ? evamapi sarvapuruṣāṇām ekākāro bhogaḥ syāt, puṇyāpuṇyā dhikaraṇaiḥ paramāṇubhirārambhāviśeṣāt ।

II,230,21

atha kecit puṇyādhikaraṇāḥ paramāṇavo 'nye cāpuṇyādhikaraṇāḥ । tatrādhikaiḥ puṇyādhikaraṇairārabdhe sukhātiśayo 'dhikaiścāpuṇyādhikaraṇairduḥkhamiti cet, atrāpi tayonityatve maraṇādyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ । anityatvantu na yuktam । paramāṇuviśeṣaguṇānāmasmadādivyāpāreṇopapatteradarśanāt ।

II,230,25 (VyV_II,230,25)

anye tvanāśrito dharma iti manyante, tatrāpi anityapakṣe na kiñcid anāśritaṃ bastubhūtaṃ kārya sambhavatīti dūṣaṇam । nityapakṣe tu yāgādikriyā vilopaprasaṅgaḥ । atha kriyābhivyaktaḥ kāryakāraṇaḥ ? tarhi kṣaṇikatvena kriyāvināśe svargādiphalaṃ na syāt । na ca pradīpasyevābhivyañjakatvaṃ tatprakāśa katvaṃ kriyāyāḥ, tadbhāve 'pi tasyānupalambhāt । atha yāgādikriyā dharmasya sāmarthyamupajanayatīti cet ? tarhi yat tat sāmarthyaṃ sa eva dharmaḥ, yatrāśritaḥ sa cātmeti saṃjñābhedamātraṃ syāt । tathā amūrtasyātmanā sambandhābhāvāt tatsambandhitvena phalābhāva ityalaṃ prasaṅgena । na ca bodhātmakameva karma, vyati rekānabhyupagame bodharūpatayā sarvatrāviśeṣeṇa jagadvaicitryāprasaṅgāt ।

II,231,6 (VyV_II,231,6_II,231,13)

tasyotpattikāraṇamāha puruṣāntaḥkaraṇasaṃyogādasamavāyikāraṇādupajāyate । * śuddhābhisandhija * iti abhisandhenimittakāraṇatvaṃ darśayati । varṇāśramiṇāṃ pratiniyatāni sādhanāni nimittaṃ yasyāsau tannimittaḥ ।

II,231,10

tadevāha * tasya tu sādhanāni śrutismṛtivihitāni * । varṇāśca brāhmaṇādayaḥ, āśramāśca brahmacaryādayasteṣām, sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvenāvasthitāni dravyaguṇakarmāṇīti ।

II,231,13

(“tatra sāmānyāni dharme śraddhā, ahiṃsā, bhūtarhitatvam, satyavacanam, asteyam, anupadhā, brahmacaryam, kodhavarjanam, abhiṣecanam, śucidravyasevanam, viśiṣṭadevatābhaktiḥ, upavāso 'pramādaśca ।”)

II,231,16 (VyV_II,231,16)

* tatra sāmānyāni * sādhanāni । * dharme śraddhā - bhaktiviśeṣaḥ kāraṇam । ahiṃsā tu yatyādeḥ sarvadā, anyasya deśaviśeṣeṣe kālaviśeṣe ceti । yathā tīrthe na haniṣyāmi, amāvāsyādau । bhūtarhitvamapi kasyacit sarvadā, kasyacid deśaviśeṣādāviti । satyavacanaṃ dharmasādhanam yanna pareṣāmaniṣṭam । uktañca 'na brūyāt satyamapriyami'ti । asteyamacauryam । kasyāñcidavasthāyāṃ caurye 'pi na dūṣaṇamityuktam । yathā mumūrṣodvijasyāśanamātrāharaṇamiti । anupadhā parādrohaḥ । brahmacaryam apatyasṛjaḥ karaṇasyopasthasya saṃyamaḥ, tacca kasyacit sarvadā, kasyacid deśakālaviśeṣa iti । krodhavarjanamapyevam । abhiṣecanaṃ snānam । śucidravyāṇāṃ sevanamāsanaparidhānāśanaiḥ । viśiṣṭa devatābhaktiriti trayīprasiddhānumānāvagatadevatāviśeṣabhaktiḥ । upavāso 'horātraṃ nairaśanatā, kālaviśeṣādau dharmasādhanam । apramādo vihitānuṣṭhāne nirālasyam ।

II,232,1 (VyV_II,232,1_II,232,6)

(“brāhmaṇakṣatriyavaiśyānāmijyādhyayanadānāni । bāhmaṇasya viśiṣṭāni pratigrahādhyāpanayājanāni, svavarṇavihitāśca saṃskārāḥ । kṣatriyasya samyakaprajāpālanamasādhunigraho yuddheṣvanivartanam, svakīyāśca saṃskārāḥ । vaiśyasya kayavikraya kṛṣipaśupālanāli svakīyāśca saṃskārāḥ । śūdrasya ; pūrvavarṇapāratantryam, amantrikāca kriyāḥ ।”)

II,232,6

brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ sāmānyāni dharmasādhanāni, ijyā yajanam, adhyayana vedapāṭhaḥ, dānaṃ satpātrasya dravyanivedanamiti । brāhmaṇasyāsādhāraṇāni dharma sādhanāni * pratigrahādhyāpanayājanāni । pratigrahaḥ śāstreṇāninditadravyādānam, vedapāṭho, yājanaṃ yāge paurohityam, svavarṇaniyatāśca saṃskārāḥ । kṣatriyasyā sādhāraṇāni dharmasādhanāni 5 samyak prajāpālanam, asādhunigraho yuddhaṣva nivartanam, svakīyāśca saṃskārāḥ । vaiśyasya krayavikrayakṛṣipaśupālanāni, svakīyāśca saṃskārāḥ । śūdrasya sarvadā brāhmaṇādyājñayā vartanam, amantrakāścoṅkārādivijitāḥ kriyā iti * ।

II,232,14 (VyV_II,232,14_II,232,27)

(“āśramiṇāntu, brahmacāriṇaḥ gurukulanivāsinaḥ svaśāstra vihitāni śuruśuśrūṣānondhanabhaikṣyāvaraṇāni adhumāṃsadivāsvapnāñjanā bhyañjanādivarjana ca । vidyāvatasnātakasya kṛtadārasya gahastharava śālīna yāyāvaravṛttyupajitarā bhūtabanuṣyadevapitṛnahmākhyānāṃ pañcānā mahāyajñānāṃ sāyamprātaranuṣṭhānam, ekāgnividhānena pākayajñasaṃsthānāca nityānāṃ śaktau vidyamānāyām । agnyādheyādonāca haviryajñasaṃsthānām agniṣṭomādīnāma, somayajñasaṃsthānāñca । ṛtvantareṣa brahmacaryamapatyā tpādanañca । brahmacāriṇo gahasthasya vā nāmānirgatasya vanavāsa balkalājinakeśaśmanakharokhadhāraṇañca । vanyābahatātithiśeṣabhājannāna vanasthasya । trayāṇāmanyatamasya śraddhāvataḥ sarvabhalemyo nityamabhaya daramā saṃnyastha svāni karmāṇi yamaniyameṣvapramattasya ṣaṭpadārthaprasakhyāna yogaprasādhanaṃ pravajitasyeti । iṣṭañca prayojanamanahiśyaitāni sādhana bhāvaprasādañcāpekṣayā āgamanasoḥ saṃyogāddharmotpattiriti ।”)

II,232,27

*āśramiṇāntu dharmasādhanānyacyante । tatrabrahmacāriṇaḥ,ki viśiṣṭatva gurukūle vasatastacchīlaṃ veti tadvāsino * guruśuśraṣāgnīndhanabhaikṣyācaraṇāni * । guruśuśrūṣā tadupāsanam । agnīndhanam agnyarthamindhanāharaṇam । bhikṣāṇāṃ samūhā bhakṣa mādhukarī bhikṣā, tadācaraṇam । madhumāṃsadivāsvapnāñjanābhyañja nādivarjanam । etatta prativedaṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇītyaṣṭacatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi vidyāvataṃ yāvad grahaṇaṃ bhavet ।

II,233,5 (VyV_II,233,5^1) (VyV_II,233,5^2)

tato vidyāvratasnātakasya cīrṇavidyāvratasya kṛtadārasyodvahitapatnīkasya tyasya dharmasādhanānyucyante । te caturvidhāḥ, vārtāvṛttayaḥ, śālīnavṛttayaḥ, pāvarāḥ, ghorasaṃnyāsikāśceti । tatra vārtāvṛttayaḥ kṛṣivāṇijyādikama pata śāstraṇava yañjantaḥ śatasaṃvatsarābhiḥ kriyābhiryajanto yājayanta māna prārthayante । śālīnavattayastu yajanto yājayanto dadataḥ pratigṛhṇantaḥ śatasaṃvatsarābhiḥ kriyābhirātmānaṃ prārthayante । yāyāvarāstu adhīyanto । adhyāpayantaḥ, yajanto na, 7 yājayantaḥ, dadatto na pratigṛhṇantaḥ, ityātmāna prārthayante । tatra ghorasaṃnyāsikā nāma uddhṛtaparapūtābhirabhiḥ pya kurvāṇāḥ pratidinamāhatoñchavṛttimupajīvantaḥ śatasaṃvatsarābhiḥ kriyā janta ātmānaṃ prārthayante । udāharaṇārthañca gṛhasthadvayam । ukta lāna ! śālīna | yāyāvaravṛttyupājitadravyairbhūtamanuṣyadevapitṛbrahmākhyānāṃ yā mahāyajñānāṃ sāyaṃ prātaranaṣṭhānam । sāyamaparā, - bāhyabalinā bhatayajñaḥ. hantakāreṇa 〈〉 = atithideyataṇḍulena । manaṣya ' puṣpapatrādyutsargeṇāgnisantarpaṇena devayajñaḥ । atidānena pitṛyajñaḥ, pacanana brahmayajña ityeṣāṃ sāyaṃ prātaranaṣṭhānam । ekāgnividhānena eko 'gni kāle parigṛhīta iti । naimittikānāntu parasparaṃ vyāvṛttamanuṣṭhānabhedaṃ darśayati * pākayajñasaṃsthānāma * ityādinā । pākayajñasaṃsthāstu aṣṭakāḥ pārvaṇaṃ śrāddhaṃ śrāvaṇyāgrahāyaṇī tathā / catrī cāśvayujī caiva (sapta?) pākasaṃsthā imāḥ smṛtāḥ // yajñaḥ, puṣpapatrādyutsagaṇa vedādhyayanena brahmayajña na doṣa iti । tadevāha । ।

II,233,24 (VyV_II,233,24_II,234,5^1)

eṣāśca nityānāṃ śaktau vidyamānāyāmanuṣṭhānam । asamarthasya tvakaraṇe 'pi na dośa iti । tadevāha “jarayā ha vā eṣa etasmāt satrād vipramucyate “mṛtyunā veti” । agnyādheyānāñca haviyajñasasyātām । agnyādheyānāñca haviryajñasaṃsthānām । agnyādheyo 'gnihotraṃ sā ca cāturmāsyāgrahāyaṇeṣṭinirūḍhapaśubandhasautrāmaṇī ceti saptahaviryajñasaṃsthāḥ । agniṣṭomo 'tyagniṣṭoma ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśī vājapeyo 'tirā trāptoryāma iti sapta homayajñasaṃsthāḥ । tadāha “somayajñasaṃsthānāmagniṣṭomā dīnāmiti” । evamanye 'pi yajñaviśeṣāstacchāstraprasiddhā eva grāhyā iti । ṛtvantareṣu brahmacaryamapatyotpādanañca ।

II,234,5 (VyV_II,234,5^2) (VyV_II,234,5^3)

vanasthasya dharmasādhanamāha * brahmacāriṇo gṛhasthasya vā vanavāsaḥ * iti । uktañca “yadi vā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet” iti । ato brahmacāriṇo gṛhasthasya vā adhikāraḥ । te 'pi caturvidhāḥ, vaikhānasāḥ, audumbarāḥ, bālakhilyāḥ, phenapāśceti । tatra vaikhānasā nāma akṛṣṭa pacyābhirauṣadhībhimabahiṣkṛtābhiragniparicaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pañcamahāyajñakriyāṃ nivartayanta ātmānaṃ prārthayante । tatraudumbarā nāma prātarutthāya yāṃ diśaṃ prekṣante tadāhṛtairbadaranīvāraśyāmākairagniparicaraṇaṃ kṛtvā pañcamahāyajñakriyāṃ nivartayanta ātmānaṃ prārthayante । tatra bālakhilyā nāma jaṭādharā cīravalkalasaṃvṛtāṅgāḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā kāttikyāṃ puṣyādibhakṣa mutsṛjanta aṣṭau māsān vṛttyupārjanaṃ kṛtvā pañcamahāyajñakriyāṃ nivartayanta ātmānaṃ prārthayante । tatra phenapā nāma uddaṇḍakānanmattāḥ śīrṇapatrābhibhojino yatra tatra vā vasanta ātmānaṃ prārthayante । tadevāha * valkalājinakeśaśmaśrunakha romadhāraṇaṃ vanyāmbahutātithiśeṣabhojanāni vanasthasya * iti । yatyāśramamupadarśa yannāha * trayāṇāmanyatamasya * iti । trayāṇāṃ brahmacārigṛhasthavānaprasthānāmanya tamasya । kiṃ viśiṣṭasya ? * śraddhāvataḥ । sarvabhatebhyo nityaṃ sarvadā abhayaṃ datvā । uktañca “na hisyāt sarvabhūtānīti” । * saṃnyasya svāni karmāṇi * agni hotrādīni । * yamaniyameṣvapramattasya * iti । ahiṃsādayo yamāḥ, śuśrūṣādayā niyamāḥ, teṣvapramattasya । * ṣaṭpadārthaprasaṃkhyānāt * parijñānād * yogasādhana pravajitasya * iti । yoga eva tasya dharmasādhanam ।

II,234,24 (VyV_II,234,24)

uktanyāyena te 'pi caturvidhāḥ; kuṭīcakāḥ, bahadakāḥ, haṃsāḥ, paramahaṃsā śceti । kuṭīcakāstridaṇḍakamaṇḍalukanthādidhāriṇo jñātigaheṣu bhojinaḥ । bahudakā nāma brāhmaṇagṛheṣu bhikṣāśinaḥ śūnyāgāradevagṛhavāsinaḥ । haṃsā nā śikhākamaṇḍaludaṇḍahastā grāmaikarātravāsinastīrthādiṣa tripañcarātram, eka pakṣopavāsādibhirātmānaṃ prārthayante । paramahaṃsāstvekadaṇḍadharāḥ, muṇḍāḥ, kaupīnavāsasaḥ, śikhāyajñopavītakamaṇḍalabhikṣākapālādīnāñca tyāginaḥ । sapā dho nādharmaḥ, na satyam, na cānatam । sarvasahāḥ, sarvasamāḥ, lāṣṭāśmakāñcanāḥ । eṣāṃ caturṇāmapi dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanamanuddiśyaitāni vanāni bhāvaprasādaṃ śaddhābhisandhiñcāpekṣya ātmamanaḥsaṃyogādasamavāyi kāraṇāddharmotpattiriti ।

§ adharmavaidharmyam

II,235,7 (VyV_II,235,7_II,235,25)

(“adharmo 'pyātmaguṇaḥ । kartarahitapratyavāyaheturatīndriyo 'ntyaduḥkhasaṃvi virādhī । tasya tu sādhanāni, śāstre pratiṣiddhāni dharmasādhanaviparītāni hiṃsāntasteyādoni. vihitākaraṇam, pramādaśca, etāni duṣṭābhi pacāpekṣyātmamanasoḥ saṃyogādadharmasyo 〈tpattiḥ ? tpādakāni 〉 ।”)

II,235,11

na paraṃ dharmo 'dharmopyātmagaṇaḥ । * kartarahitapratyavāyaheturatīndriyo 'ntyaduḥkha sānāvarādhī * iti । atondriyatve satyantyadūḥkhasaṃvijñānavirodhitvāt, adharṃaḥ, itarasmāda bhidyate । śeṣa parvavata । tasya sādhanāni śāstre viprati "māna dharmasādhanaviparītāni hiṃsānatasteyādīni । hiṃsā prāṇivadho 'natama 1 stayaṃ cauryama । ādipadenānyeṣāmapi dharmasādhanaviparītānāmavarodhaḥ, cakattavyasya saṃdhyāvandanāderakaraṇaṃ vihitakālātikrameṇāpyananuṣṭhānam, 52cālasyam । etāni nimittāni duṣṭābhisandhi duṣṭābhiprāyaṃ cāpekṣyā manāsayogādasamavāyikāraṇādātmanyadharmo 〈tpattiriti ? tpādakānīti । 〉

II,235,19

(“aviduṣo rāgadveṣavataḥpravartakādadharmāt prakṛṣṭāt svalpādhasahitād prajāpatipitamanaṣyalokeṣvāśayānurūpairiṣṭaśarīrendriyaviṣayasukhā pānā bhavati । tathā prakṛṣṭādadharmāta svalpadharmasahitāta pretatiryaga nasthāneṣa aniṣṭaśarīrendriyaviṣayadaḥkhādibhiryogo bhavati, ityevaṃ lakṣaṇād dharmādadharmasahitād devamanuṣyatiryanārakeṣu punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāraprabandho bhavati ।”)

II,235,25

(“jñānapūrvakāttu kṛtādasaṅkalpitaphalāda viśuddhe kule jātasya duḥkhavigamopāyajijñāsorācāryamupasaṅgamyotpannaṣaṭapadārthatattvajñānasyājñāna - "tā viraktasya rāgadveṣādyabhāvāta tajjayordharmādharmayoranutpattau pūrvasañcitayoścopabhogānirodhe santoṣasukhaṃ śarīrapari〈cche? khe〉dañcotpādya rāgādinivṛttau nivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ kevalo dharmaḥ paramārthadarśana sukhaṃ kṛtvā nivartate, tadā nirodhāt nirbījasyātmanaḥ śārīrādinivṛttiḥ । punaḥ śarīrādyanutpattau dagdhendhanānalavadupaśamo mokṣa iti ।”)

II,236,5 (VyV_II,236,5)

idānīṃ kasyopajātaṃ karma saṃsārasampādakaṃ kathañca nivartakamityupa darśayati aviduṣo mithyājñānavato dharmādharmāvutpannau saṃsāraṃ sampādayatastadāha pravartakāt saṃsārasampādakād dharmāt prakṛṣṭāt svalpādharmasahitāt । iṣṭāni ca tāni śarīrendriyaviṣayasukhādīni taiḥ । kiviśiṣṭaiḥ ? āśayānurūpa karmānurūpairyogaḥ sambandho bhavatīti । keṣu sthāneṣu ? brahmendraprajāpatipitṛ 〈〉ṛṣi? manuṣyalokeṣviti । * tathā prakṛṣṭādadharmāt svalpadharmasahitāt, aniṣṭa śarīrendriyaviṣayaduḥkhādibhiryogaḥ * । keṣu ? * pretatiyaṃgayonisthāneṣu * iti । upasaṃhāramāha * ityevaṃ pravṛttilakṣaṇāt * tatsvarūpād । * dharmādadharmasahitād devamanuṣyatiryaṅnārakeṣu punaḥ punaḥ saṃsārasya prabandhaḥ santāno bhavatīti ।

II,236,14 (VyV_II,236,14^1) (VyV_II,236,14^2) (VyV_II,236,14^3)

pravartakāddharmāt saṃsārotpattimupadiśya nivartakāt tannivṛttimāha * jñāna pūrvakāttu kṛtāt * iti । jñānaṃ pūrvaṃ yasya sa tathoktastasmāt । kiṃ rūpāt । *asaṅkalpitaphalāt iti । itthaṃ me śarīrendriyaviṣayāḥ sampadyantām, netthamityava na saṅkalpitaṃ phalaṃ yasya sa tathoktastasmād, viśuddhe kule janma bhavati । tasya jātasya daḥkhavigamopāyajijñāsā sampadyate kṛtaḥ sādhanādatyantaṃ duḥkha santateviyogaḥ sampadyata iti । evaṃ jijñāsorācāryopasaṅgamaḥ sampadyata । tañcopasaṅgamya duḥkhasantānavyāvṛtteruṣāyaṃ vijānāti tattvajñānācchya sampadyata iti । tataḥ śāstrābhyāsāta ṣaṭapadārthatattvajñānamatpadyate । tara cotpannaṣaṭpadārthajñānasya ajñānanivṛttirbhavati । tannivṛttau virāgaḥ, kāraṇa bhāvena kāryasyānutpatteḥ । viraktasya rāgadveṣābhāvāt tābhyāṃ jāyate yā dhana dharmoṃ tau tajjau, tayoranutpattiriti, rāgadveṣayodharmādharmajanakatvenopalabdha tadabhāve tadabhāvo bhavatyeva । sañcitayośca nirodhastattvajñānādapabhogād vā । tato rāgādinivṛttau satyāṃ nivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ kevalo dharmaḥ santoṣasukhaṃ śarāra paricche?khe〈〉daṃ cotpādayati । taccotpādya paramārthaḥ sarvapadārthānāmāranā taddarśanājjātaṃ paramārthadarśana sakhaṃ karoti । tata kṛtvā nivartate । tadā nigata dharmādharmasamākhyātaṃ bījaṃ yasyāsau tathoktastasyātmanaḥ śarīrādinivṛttiḥ । bījābhāvādeva punaḥ śarīrādyanatpattau satyāṃ* dagdhendhanānalavadapaśamo mākṣaḥ * iti । yathā dagdhendhanasyānalasyopaśamo jvālādirahitasyāvasthānam avadatyanta viśeṣaguṇavimuktasyātmano 'vasthānaṃ mokṣa iti nirṇītamādivākye ।

II,237,6 (VyV_II,237,6_II,237,17)

(“śabdo 'mbaraguṇaḥ, śrotragrāhyaḥ, kṣaṇikaḥ, kāryakāraṇobhayavirodhī, māgavibhāgaśabdajaḥ, pradeśavattiḥ, samānāsamānajātīyakāraṇaḥ । vidhā varṇalakṣaṇo dhvanilakṣaṇaśca । tatra akāradivarṇalakṣaṇaḥ, śaṅakhā dānāmato dhvanilakṣaṇaśca । tatra varṇalakṣaṇasyotpattiḥ, ātmamanasoḥ pagāt smṛtyapakṣāda varṇoccāraṇecchā, tadanantaraṃ prayatnaḥ, tamapekṣamāṇā samavāyusaṃyogāda vāyo karma jāyate, sa covaṃ gacchan kaṇṭhādīnabhihanti, tataḥ sthānavāyusaṃyogāpekṣāta sthānākāśasaṃyogād varṇotpattiḥ । avarṇa lakṣaṇo 'pi bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogāpekṣād bheryākāśasaṃyogātpadyate । veṇaparva māgād veṇvākāśa vibhāgācca śabdācca saṃyogavibhāganiṣpannāda cāsantānavacchanda santāna ityevaṃ santānena śrotrapradeśamāgatasya raṇam (nāsti ?). pariśeṣāta santānasiviriti ।”)

II,237,17

śabdasya lakṣaṇaparīkṣārthamāha * śabdo 'mbaraguṇaḥ * ityādi । ambara ugatvācchabda ityukte saṃkhyādibhirvyabhicārastadarthaṃ śrotragrāhya iti । śabdaḥ, tarasmād bhidyate, ambaraguṇatve sati śrotragrāhyatvāditi । kṣaṇika iti parokṣārtham । parvapadāpekṣaṃ vā lakṣaṇam ।

II,237,21 (VyV_II,237,21)

nanu cāsiddhaṃ śabde kṣaṇikatvam, pratyabhijñānāderupalambhāt । yamahamaśrauṣaṃ śabdam, tametarhi śṛṇomi iti śroturvijñānamutpadyamānamupalabdham । na cedamapramāṇam, anyatāgrāhakapramāṇānupalabdheḥ । tathā arthāpattyā ca "dasya nityatvaṃ vijñāyate । anityatve hi saṅkatakālānubhūtaśabdavilayottara pala śabdāntaropalambhādasatitā tadarthapratipattirna syāt । sā copalabhyata śata tadanyathānupapattyā śabdasya nityatvaṃ jñāyate ।

II,238,1 (VyV_II,238,1_II,238,5^1)

tadetadasat, gṛhītagrāhitvena pratyabhijñānasyāpramāṇatvāt; “anadhiga tārthagantṛ pramāṇam” iti sāmānyalakṣaṇābhidhānāt । athānadhigatārthe pratya bhijñānam ? tanna, adṛṣṭārthatāyā mithyātvaprasaṅgāt । atha svarūpeṇādhi gatārthamapīdānīntanaṃ deśakālādyapekṣayānadhigatārthañceti ।

II,238,5 (VyV_II,238,5^2)

nanvevamapyubhayadoṣopanipātaprasaṅgaḥ । prameyasāmagryāñca deśakālāderanta rbhāvābhyupagame 'nadhimatārthatvam, etāvatā prameyasya pūrvamapratipatteḥ । na ca śrotravyāpāreṇa deśakālādebrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam । atha pramāṇasāmagryāmantarbhāvaḥ, tarhi pramāṇasyānyatve 'pi prameyasya tādavasthyādadhigatārthaviṣayatvameva । tadapekṣayā caṃda viśeṣaṇam, anyathā hi vyavacchedyābhāvādanupapannameva syāt, pramāṇasāmagryā niyatavijñānajanakatvāt । sarvatra prameyabhedādeva vijñānabheda ityabhyupagama pratijñānamanyatāyāṃ kṣaṇikatāprasaṅgaḥ । tasmādanadhigatārthagantṛ pramāṇamityava vādino pramāṇameva pratyabhijñānam । tathā chinnodbhūtakeśanakhādiṣvanyatve 'pi sādṛśyavaśāt pratyabhijñānam । sāmānyādau cārthatathābhāvāditi dvavidhyā palabdheviśeṣānupalabdhau śabde pratyabhijñānam । na ca vyañjakānāṃ sandigdha tvādapramāṇatvam, svataḥ prāmāṇyasya pūrvameva pratiṣedhāt; anyataḥ pramāṇāda abhedapratipattyabhyupagame ca tadevāstvalaṃ pratyabhijñānena । tathā vyañjakānā kṣaṇikatayā śabdajñānānantarameva tirobhāve śabdasya, niviṣayameva syāt pratyabhijñānam । na ca vyañjakānāṃ nityatvam, sarvadā śabdavyaktiprasaṅgāt ।

II,238,19 (VyV_II,238,19_II,238,24^1)

atha pratyabhijñānānyathānupapattyā tatkālaṃ yāvadavasthānam ? na, anyathāpi tadbhāvāt । anityatve 'pi sādṛśyavaśāt pratyabhijñānamutpadyata eveti । vivādagocarāpannaḥ śabdo 'bhivyaktaḥ pratyabhijñānakālaṃ yāvannāvatiṣṭhata, śabdapratyayaviṣayatvāt, pūrvānubhūtaśabdavat । na ca pratyabhijñānaṃ nityatvāta pādanāyālam, anitye 'pi bhāvāt ।

II,238,24 (VyV_II,238,24^2) (VyV_II,238,24^3)

athāvasthāyitvaṃ sādhyate ? tatrāpi santatāvasthāne tadeva dūṣaṇam . avasthānamātrantu siddhasādhanam, upalambhasaṅketasmaraṇakrameṇārthopalambhakā yāvadavasthānābhyupagamāt । atha pūrvopalabdhe śabde varṣādivyavadhānamā pratyabhijñānād antarāle 'vasthānaṃ sādhyate ? na. anyatve 'pi pratyabhijñānopalabdhaḥ । yathā bālāvasthāyāmupalabdhe devadatte anyatve 'pi vṛddhāvasthāyāmupa lambhāt pratyabhijñānam । na cātrāvasthābhedamātrameva śarīrasyeti vācyam, avayavaracanāparimāṇarūpādivyatirekeṇa tadanupalambhāt । bālāvasthāyāṃ hi śithilāvayavaracanā kumārāvasthāyāṃ cānyathābhūteti tadbhedāt śarīrasya bhado 'vaśyaṃ bhāvī, asamavāyikaraṇavināśena kāryadra vyasya vināśopalabdheḥ, parimāṇabhedopalabdheśca । pūrvaparimāṇanivṛttāvevottaraparimāṇam, parimāṇavati parimāṇārambhapratiṣedhāt । etad rupādiṣvapi samānam । parimāṇavināśaścā śrayavināśādeva ityanyatvameva । bālādiśarīrāṇāṃ parimāṇabhedasya kuvalayādā vanyatvenaiva vyāptatvāt । atha parasparaṃ vyāvṛtto bālādyavasthāśabdābhidheyo dhamaḥ, tasya ca vyatireke vṛddhāvasthāyāmapi bālādīnāmupalambhaḥ syāt, tenā virodhāt, virodhe vā kathamanyatvamasiddham; avyatireke 'pi teṣāmāvirbhāva tirobhāvābhyāṃ dharmiṇo 'pi tathābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ । tasmāccharīrabhede 'pi sādṛśyāt sa evāyaṃ devadatta iti jñānavacchabde 'pi pratyabhijñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti śabdo palambhādanantaraṃ śrotravyāpāreṇaiva tadabhāvapratīterekatvagrāhakaṃ pratyabhijñānama pramāṇam ।

II,239,16 (VyV_II,239,16)
